The received funds will be evenly distributed for product development and promotion according to the financial plan.  So, the Additional Stage of the Crypt-ON TGE is now in session! Are you with us?  P.S. Regarging Bounty campaign. There will be a Turbo-Bounty campaign during the Additional Stage of the Crypt-ON TGE and it will start on the 15th of February. Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Dear Crypt-ON community, there is a question, that the whole crypto community is interested in. Who is Satoshi Nakamoto? Crypt-ON’s own CEO Paul Andreev tried to answer this question in his new article. Read here — https://nakamotosatochi.com/

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hello, dear Crypt-ON community!  We have some great news for you today.  First of all, we are happy to announce, that there we are going to have a Turbo-Bounty campaign. It starts today, February 14th. The end of the Turbo Bounty would be March 1st.  As promised, besides the stacks for the completed tasks, we randomly draw $250 between the participants (100$ for the first random pick, 80$ for the second, 70$ for the third), as well as 10.000 i-Point Tokens between the participants!  So, here are the tasks!  1. Share the article «Who are you, Mr. Nakamoto?» in Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin (in each social media) through nakamotosatochi.com site 2. Share the article «Who are you, Mr. Nakamoto?» on Bitcointalk, Reddit, Steemit, Topix и Bitcoin.com (on each forum) from nakamotosatochi.com site 3. Record a video about satochinakamoto.com site and publish it to youtube.com 4. Share the link to https://whoisandreev.com/ on Bitcointalk, Reddit, Steemit, Topix и Bitcoin.com (on each forum) 5. Record a video about https://whoisandreev.com/ site and publish it to youtube.com 6. Share the link to https://whoisandreev.com/ site on Facebook, Twitter and Linkedin with a short article (in each social media) 7. Publish the link to the post about the start of Crypt-ON's Turbo-Bounty from our official groups/accounts on Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin (from post in each social media) 8. Publish the link to the post about the start of Crypt-ON's Turbo-Bounty from our official group on Facebook to Bitcointalk, Reddit, Steemit, Topix и Bitcoin.com (on each forum) 9. Write a post/tweet on your page telling people to participate in Crypt-ON Additional TGE Stage (1-2 sentences at least). You should have 250 friends/followers at least 10. Write an article upon «Who are you, Mr. Nakamoto?» from nakamotosatochi.com site and share it to your Medium account.  Groups requirements: 1) English speaking community. If you want to publish a post in a community that is NOT English — consult with our Bounty-Manager. Each specific situation is solved individually depending on how good the source is. 2) A community must be active, have at least 2000 members (2000 views for Bitcointalk). 3) Groups should be focused on fintech / cryptocurrency 5) 1 group = 1 post / comment. This requirement will be strictly checked 6) A comment should not be deleted. Upon completion, you need to fill out a Report about the task, which must contain confirming links and screenshots! Otherwise, the report is not accepted and the task is considered to be failed.  The deadline for sending the task report is February 28, 23 hours 59 minutes GMT.  Let's pump Crypt-ON together! Join our bounty chat and earn more tokens!  Let's keep in touch Crypt-ON team

The convenient search engine and objective rating system will allow companies/projects and freelancers from around the world to quickly find each other and agree on terms of cooperation. Author: maryjanewatson
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hey Alsil Miron. The process works the following way:  1. The customer places a request with a description of the task. For the convenience of customers and performers, a searching system provides a selection by rating and allows you to find a highly qualified performer quickly or to have an idea of the customer’s reliability. 2. At the same time, the customer’s account must have enough i-Point tokens to pay for the contractor’s services; otherwise, he will not be able to publish the task. 3. Performers submit applications. 4. Customers consider candidates and confirm their choice. The contractor and the customer specify in advance the terms of a deal recorded in the smart-contract. 5. The task goes to work. After its execution, the contractor sends the results of the work for verification. 6. Payment for the finished service/work is carried out in i-Point tokens. 7. If the work had been violated the conditions fixed in the smart contract, an arbitrator includes in the dispute resolution. The arbitrator acts as a third party in the multi-signature of the smart-contract. 8. All actions of the parties are stored in the smart-contract and affect the reputation of both the customer and the contractor, changing their rating.

Well, basically, P2P lending or peer-to-peer lending or crowdlending is a type of contractual loan relations, which excludes intermediaries in the face of banks and other financial institutions, charging a fee for the transaction. The main idea reflected in the name “P2P” — it also means "person-to-person"

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Can predictions change the way we think?  https://scontent-frt3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.0-9/48268838_1279432868866584_4487387852404948992_n.jpg?_nc_cat=104&_nc_ht=scontent-frt3-1.xx&oh=cadaf34a40e5294e7e76f5850ac01f15&oe=5C642C21  It is not the first month that we have been seeing how Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies are losing their strength. Even though that many analysts promised that the rates will be back up by the end of 2018. As a result, everyone made a mistake with the forecasts -  experienced traders, digital asset market experts, and trusted financial leaders.  Co-founder of Fundstrat Global Investors and trusted financial analyst, Tom Lee predicted that at the end of 2018, Bitcoin would meet a mark of $25,000. Later, at the end of November, he lowered the mark down to $15,000. With all due respect to Tom now we can state the fact that this steep turn is unlikely to happen. In an interview for CNBC, Tom Lee commented on his unsuccessful predictions, saying that lowering the price of bitcoin lower than a psychological mark of 6,000 "was the cause of a new wave of pessimism." In his opinion, the fair price of digital gold should be 2.5 times more, than the cost of mining it. And that it’s necessary to build on self-sufficiency "- the level at which the cost of mining Bitcoin corresponds to its trading rate. Back im the yewar of 2017 Roni Moas, Head of investment company Standpoint Research promised that by the end of 2018 the rate of Bitcoin will be at $ 50,000. Many other analysts of the cryptocurrency market also made their predictions, and all of them where looking good, and the Bitcoin price was supposed  to go up.  So, what to do during a prolonged downtrend - buy, sell or just wait for better times? There are several options that are out there, one of the best ones for example, is to invest in promising Crypt-ON platform being developed as a solution to many problems of modern financial markets.  All you need is to purchase i-Point tokens.  The link for registration is: https://crypt-on.io/

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: A successful visit to Singapore of CEO Crypt-ON Paul Andreev  Last week, Singapore hosted the largest event of the year in the Asian region - BLOCKSHOW ASIA 2018. From November 27 to December 1, crypto enthusiasts from all over the world could share their views, experience, talk about plans. CEO of Crypt-ON Paul Andreev was among those who have prepared for potential investors information about a new promising project that has a great future not only for the crypto industry but also for the financial markets. The Crypt-ON project is aimed at solving the problems of these markets and their participants. Paul got chance to meet with a large number of crypto-enthusiasts, developers, business angels, speakers – those who believe in the future of blockchain and see the success of the community in close collaboration.  CEO Crypt-ON had a short conversation with co-founder and former CEO of the cryptocurrency exchange BTCC Bobby Lee. Bobby and Paul discussed the future of the cryptocurrency market, the price of bitcoin, shared their expectations and agreed that we should expect change for the better and agreed that the blockchain and cryptocurrencies have great prospects, despite the difficulties that the industry is experiencing in this difficult formative period.  Crypt-ON team

Body: Turbo bounty from Crypt-ON: Round 5  As promised, we continue the Turbo bounty, and today the 5rd round begins!  We remind you the rules: 10 percent of the total bounty pool will be distributed over the next 10 weeks — 1% each week. Every week, in the bounty chat will be placed a task that will need to be done within the next five days; after which the participants of the current stage of the turbo-bounty, who completed the task following the described terms receive their stacks. Each round will start on Friday and last 6 calendar days, until Wednesday of the next week incl.  Thus, the deadline for sending the task report of the 5th round is December 10, 23 hours 59 minutes GMT.  So, here is the task of the 5th round of Turbo bounty from Crypt-ON!  You must publish the link about results of last Turbo-bounty week (https://medium.com/@Crypt__ON/turbo-bounty-from-crypt-on-results-of-4th-week-fc871a419435) in various groups/publics/threads in social media. Moreover, you need to add a comment “Hey guys! I just won $100 in Turbo-Bounty from Crypt-ON! Join the movement, it is really great here!  Groups requierments:  1) English speaking community. If you want to publish a post in a community that is NOT English — consult with our Bounty-Manager. Each specific situation is solved individually depending on how good the source is. 2) A community must be active, have at least 2000 members (2000 views for Bitcointalk). 3) Groups should be focused on fintech / cryptocurrency 5) 1 group = 1 post / comment. This requirement will be strictly checked 6) A comment should not be deleted.  Upon completion, you need to fill out a Report about the task, which must contain confirming links and screenshots! Otherwise, the report is not accepted and the task is considered to be failed.  Bonus! Besides the stacks received for completing the task in the past stage, at the end of each round we will randomly play 250 real US dollars (in btc equivalent) between the three lucky players: $120, $80 and $50 USD for the 1st, 2nd and 3rd places respectively!  Let’s pump Crypt-ON together! Join our bounty chat and earn more tokens!  Let’s keep in touch! Crypt-ON team

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Interview with Crypt-on CEO Paul Andreev: the unicity of the project  We continue the series of the interview articles with Crypt-ON CEO Paul Andreev.  We have already told you how the idea of creating a Crypt-ON platform was born. Today we will share with you our thoughts about what's common among Crypt-ON and other projects, and, most importantly, what are its significant differences and advantages.  Paul doesn't try to compare the Crypt-ON with any other projects, as, in his opinion, the platform has no competitors at the moment.  Paul doesn't deny that some startups are looks similar to Crypt-ON, but their goals are easier. Crypt-ON focused on the global level of solving the problems of financial markets. Yes, many projects aimed at these markets, and Crypt-ON would be lost among them, if not set a goal to offer something new to the market. The primary vector of development of the project is its gradual evolution into an ecosystem of many services combined on a single platform. Thus, it is planned to cover all the layers of the needs of financial market participants, giving them the opportunity to effectively optimize most business processes by saving time and additional costs for intermediaries in the face of financial and legal institutions.  For those of you not familiar with the roadmap of the project and the nuances of the operation mechanics of the platform, we recommend you to visit our website and look at the sections of the WhitePaper and Roadmap.  In the next publication, we will talk about how the crypto community reacted to the idea of creating a Crypt-ON platform.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: What did the co-founder of BTCC and CEO of Crypt-ON talk about?  The Chinese cryptocurrency exchange BTCC is well known to the world crypto community. Its co-founder and former CEO Bobby Lee is currently taking part in the BLOCKSHOW ASIA 2018, the main one of the annual series of events Asia Blockchain Week, taking place these days in Singapore in the famous Marina Bay Sands hotel. Recently, Bobby shared in his Twitter thoughts about the imminent changes, which, in his view, will increase the level of global liquidity of cryptocurrencies, including bitcoin. He predicts that shortly bitcoin price will rise to $ 60,000.  A similar opinion shared by the CEO of Crypt-ON Paul Andreev, who also became a participator of BLOCKSHOW ASIA 2018, and presented our project — a financial p2p platform with great prospects. Bobby and Paul discussed the future of the cryptocurrency market, the price of bitcoin, shared their expectations and agreed that we should expect changes for the better, because in reality everything is just getting started, and the most important events in the crypto industry are lies ahead.  If you also attended this large-scale event and wanted to discuss the future of cryptocurrencies with Paul or learn more about the Crypt-ON platform, you can personally talk to him at BLOCKSHOW ASIA 2018, where he will answer all your questions, share the nearest plans of the project, talk about how TGE and work on the platform services are going.

Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: In attracting investors, they focus on two audiences: 1. Large investors and crypto funds. 2. Crypto-enthusiasts and cryptoanarchists. Many users are interested in the development of the project and are waiting for the opening of the service to work as crypto-freelancers, exchange the crypto currency, lend it or borrow. For many of them, it is important that the project will be presented to the world, will become a full DAO. Institutional investors can be assured in profit, which will be justified by the fact that the token will grow along with another cryptocurrency, and the market in whole. It ia possible due to the special fund for tokens buyback to prevent the token from falling in price. We will do this because we will become DAO. It will not be a commercial project, the main purpose of which is to maximize profits, it will be aimed at increasing the cost of the token and the number of users. The platform will be owned by all crypto community, which will keep tokens on their accounts

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Great answer! But let us clarify a bit. The tasks that the project sets for itself are expressed in four services, each of which is distinguished by a unique technological approach:  -Service to assist in secure trades through an independent arbitrator (escrow) It provides the ability to conduct any type of secure trade using cryptocurrency. The insurance of transactions will serve as additional protection of interests of all parties.  -Service to assist in finding and obtaining loans (P2P lending) It provides the opportunity to borrow/lend in cryptocurrencies on mutually beneficial terms without the participation of an intermediary. The use of a rating system that determines the level of reliability of potential borrowers will reduce the number of defaults to a minimum.  -Service to assist in finding employment/specialists (crypto-freelance job exchange) It provides independent professionals in the field of the crypto industry the possibility of finding remote work, and companies or projects—the possibility of hiring such specialists. The parties can directly agree on the execution of various types of work, using the cryptocurrency in their calculations.  -Service to assist platform members in P2P cryptocurrency exchange without mediators. It provides users with the opportunity to exchange cryptocurrency for fiat money between themselves directly without the participation of an intermediary, using geotargeting to find contractors in their region.

Author: ferdi252
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Greetings everyone. Can someone once again explain me how geotargeting cryptocurrency-to-fiat exchange works?

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Evening Ferdi. Geotargeting p2p exchange works like this: the seller or the buyer places an announcement in the system to sell or buy a some amount of the cryptocurrency. You can select yout transaction partner by using geolocation in the mobile app. System also checks the buyer's account for the necessary funds for the transaction. Then the parties discuss the terms of the deal, date and time and makes an appointment

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Paul Andreev at Blockchain Life 2018 in St. Petersburg   On November 7–8 in Russia, in St. Petersburg, the international forum Blockchain Life 2018 was held.  This event brought together several thousand experts, crypto enthusiasts, representatives of startups and traditional financial institutions. Paul Andreev, a Crypt-ON CEO, also paid attention to this event and shared his impressions about the visit. First of all, he noted the generally positive feelings of the organization of the event. The forum turned out to be a mass event, as it stated in the programme, a large number of people involved in the blockchain industry one way or another gathered here. It is also worth adding an extensive list of eminent speakers who shared their experience with the audience and raised issues relevant to today’s industry. One of these speakers was Roger Ver — acting CEO of Bitcoin.com, whom Paul Andreev meet not the first time during a visit to essential blockchain events.   During the conference, the prospects of the crypto-currency market, ways of earning, problems of legal regulation and many other issues of concern to the audience discussed. However, there were also frankly empty speeches, the content of which would have been relevant a year ago, but not now at the end of 2018. Also striking was the fact that the companies represented at the forum were mostly either exchanges or ICO-startups, and all would be nothing, but there was catastrophically not enough of investors. Besides, unfortunately, there were no startups that would really challenge the world by offering something revolutionary. Nevertheless, the very organization of the forum was great.  The rest of the forum was mostly similar to other events that held in the Russian Federation and other countries.  However, since we need to look for the pros everywhere, it is a positive side can be considered definitely that Paul was able to see and analyze a significant number of startups, which in theory could compete with Crypt-ON.  Singapore and Asia Blockshow are laid ahead! Stay in touch;)

Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Crypt-ON CEO will be speaking at BlockShow Asia today   A Crypt-ON team led by CEO Paul Andreev explore the Asian region. From November 27 to December 1, Singapore traditionally hosts one of the most anticipated events of the end of the year Asia Blockchain Week, during which some events will take place, the main of which will be BlockShow Asia. Asia Blockchain Week will bring together a massive number of crypto-enthusiasts, investors, developers — all who believe in the future of the blockchain and the possibility of close cooperation with regulators in different sectors of the economy and life.  Jeffrey Huang — founder of Mithril, Creator of 17 media and Top Live-Streaming App in Asia; Naeem Aslam — a former Hedge trader at Bank of New York, Forbes columnist; Bobby Lee — co-founder of BTCC, Board member of the Bitcoin Foundation; Jay Hwang — CEO and co-founder of the FoundationX, partner and co-founder of FuturePlay and many others are declared as speakers within the BlockShow Asia .  At Asia Blockchain Week, everyone will be able to get acquainted with the Crypt-ON project closer and ask questions to the members of the Crypt-ON team.  Any interested participant can personally communicate with Paul Andreev, and he will be happy to answer all your questions, share the nearest plans of the project and talk about how TGE is progressing.

Besides the escrow service, the Crypt-ON ecosystem includes a p2p lending service, a crypto freelance marketplace and a p2p local crypto-exchange

Author: CyprusTokens
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐

Author: XxX_ZORG_XxX
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: There are the following, friend:  1) Service to assist in secure trades through an independent arbitrator (escrow) It provides the ability to conduct any type of secure trade using cryptocurrency. The insurance of transactions will serve as additional protection of interests of all parties  2) Service to assist in finding and obtaining loans (P2P lending) It provides the opportunity to borrow/lend in cryptocurrencies on mutually beneficial terms without the participation of an intermediary. The use of a rating system that determines the level of reliability of potential borrowers will reduce the number of defaults to a minimum  3) Service to assist in finding employment/specialists (crypto-freelance job exchange) It provides independent professionals in the field of the crypto industry the possibility of finding remote work, and companies or projects—the possibility of hiring such specialists. The parties can directly agree on the execution of various types of work, using the cryptocurrency in their calculations  4) Service to assist platform members in P2P cryptocurrency exchange without mediators. It provides users with the opportunity to exchange cryptocurrency for fiat money between themselves directly without the participation of an intermediary, using geotargeting to find contractors in their region

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Interview with Crypt-ON CEO Pavel Andreev: an idea of Crypt-ON  Dear community members, today we are starting a new series of articles in the interview format. We raised some critical questions to the CEO of the Crypt-ON project Paul Andreev, which he tried to answer in as much detail as possible. This series of articles will cover topics such as the future of the project, the situation in the cryptocurrency market, how is work on the creation of the platform going and many others.  It is no secret that all projects come from the world of ideas and then come to life, the same way from concept to reality developing our platform. Paul Andreev told how the idea of the Crypt-ON project was born.  “Initially, a few years ago, there was an idea of creating an escrow service for entrepreneurs to ensure the security of transactions. For several years, this idea was transformed and refined. The spread of blockchain and cryptocurrency technologies has left its mark: Paul decided to combine the escrow service with the job exchange for hiring employees and the service of loans, all this supposed to be provided by the internal i-Point currency. These basics reflected in the platform, which now each of you can see on our website and test through our MVP.  Thus, Crypt-ON is a product, the detailed planning of which took several years; it is a flexible system that has absorbed the latest technologies and is a synthesis of traditional services and modern achievements in the field of information technology”.  Here was our first question, and in the following article, you will know that became a marker of the need to create a multiservice platform.

Author: AwanishSu1
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: He is a British-American computer programmer and businessman. He founded the software company McAfee Associates in 1987 and ran it until 1994, when he resigned from the company. McAfee Associates achieved early success as the creators of McAfee, the first commercial antivirus software, and the business now produces a range of enterprise security software. The company was renamed to Intel Security in 2011 after being purchased by Intel, though the software still retains the McAfee brand name. McAfee's wealth peaked in 2007 at $100 million, before his investments plummeted in the global financial crisis that began that year.. And he is famous for his BTC prediction

Body: “Black Friday” from Crypt-ON will last another week!   Today is the eve of Black Friday, tomorrow starts the main discount campaign of the year, which will last only three days, but we are a lot cooler! For another seven days, within the next week, you will be able to buy I-Point tokens at the lowest price of this month with a 10% discount.  Take advantage of this unique opportunity and become a member of one of the top projects of the outgoing fall — Crypt-ON!  The second stage of TGE will last until November 30. The planned maximum amount of IPT tokens for sale: up to $4 000 000. The discount for tokens is 10%, and the cost of one IPT token in USD equivalent is $0.09.  The minimum volume of token purchase in USD equivalent should not be less than 50 USD. We accept FIAT, BTC, ETH, LTC, DASH, BCH, BTG.  What is needed? * Register on the website https://crypt-on.io * Pass verification in your Personal Account by providing documents confirming your identity. * Pay for I-Point tokens by making a transfer to the specified address.  If you need help in purchasing tokens — join the project Telegram chat, and we definitely will help you.  Take part in the development of the global crypto industry! Received funds will be evenly distributed for product development and promotion according to the company’s financial plan.  So, TGE is going on! Are you in? Crypt-ON team

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hello! You do not have to worry about the KYC-procedure. To pass KYC you need an identity document, they can be a car license, passport of your country, or a travel passport. This procedure is regulated by law and includes strict requirements for the protection of personal data. It is necessary so that you can become an investor on our platform, it provides transparency of transactions and contributes to the creation of a good reputation for each of the participants.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Exactly! We are glad to see that the participants of our platform know the conceptual side of the project so well In addition to your words, also on our platform will operate two additional services:  Independent dispute resolution (Arbitration) In the case of disputes in the execution of the transaction, an arbitration system is used to resolve the contradictions. This mechanism will evolve and improve with the project, seeking maximum decentralization. The platform includes a specialized software module for dispute resolution in trades and decision-making.  Insurance of trades Insurance will be available for P2P-lending and Escrow services in respect of transactions carried out in I-Point tokens. The amount of the insurance premium will depend on the reputation/rating of the user wishing to use the insurance option and the amount of the transaction. Compensation for such trades in the case of an insured event will also be calculated and paid in I-Point tokens.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Crypt-ON Team in Minsk  The Crypt-ON team brought together under the aegis of the project experts from around the world who work on the project tasks not only remotely, online, but also regularly meet to discuss important issues related to the development and promotion of the project. Live communication is indispensable, in the course of interaction of team members it generates a synergetic effect, allowing to think effectively through the implementation of strategic plans. Therefore, our professionals and experts spend time not only behind the monitors, but also attend various events dedicated to the blockchain industry and cryptocurrencies, as well as meet together and work side by side. Recently, the members of the Crypt-ON team held a four-day working meeting in Minsk, where they worked together on the most important issues related to the Crypt-ON project.  So far, we will not reveal the details, but we promise to surprise you in the near future) Crypt-ON will reach a new level soon, which will be discussed in detail in our next publications. Follow the updates of our pages in social networks and other info channels, you should not miss it!  Photo: consultant promotion — Dmitry Kin, CTO - Andrei Logunov, SMO — Michael Sezemov and IR Manager - Paul Almazov.  Stay with us Crypt-ON team!

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Evening. Geotargeting p2p exchange works like this: the seller or the buyer places an announcement in the system to sell or buy a some amount of the cryptocurrency. You can select yout transaction partner by using geolocation in the mobile app. System also checks the buyer's account for the necessary funds for the transaction. Then the parties discuss the terms of the deal, date and time and makes an appointment, pretty like this

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Greetings Mike. I can help you out with that. There are the following 4 services:  - Service to assist in secure trades through an independent arbitrator (escrow) It provides the ability to conduct any type of secure trade using cryptocurrency. The insurance of transactions will serve as additional protection of interests of all parties.  - Service to assist in finding and obtaining loans (P2P lending) It provides the opportunity to borrow/lend in cryptocurrencies on mutually beneficial terms without the participation of an intermediary. The use of a rating system that determines the level of reliability of potential borrowers will reduce the number of defaults to a minimum.  - Service to assist in finding employment/specialists (crypto-freelance job exchange) It provides independent professionals in the field of the crypto industry the possibility of finding remote work, and companies or projects—the possibility of hiring such specialists. The parties can directly agree on the execution of various types of work, using the cryptocurrency in their calculations.  - Service to assist platform members in P2P cryptocurrency exchange without mediators. It provides users with the opportunity to exchange cryptocurrency for fiat money between themselves directly without the participation of an intermediary, using geotargeting to find contractors in their region.

Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Trust-token (reputational token) is a service token to account for actions that affect the platform user's rating, and store them in encrypted form. Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Cryptocurrency market: To be, or not to be: that is the question!  The cryptocurrency market is still storms. Most of the digital assets have lost a lot in their value. What it takes for the market to stabilize and return to the indicators at least like last November-December?  Many analysts and experts believe that primarily we need any specialists related to the blockchain industry. This fact is confirmed by the indeed.com, according to which reports the demand for blockchain specialists in the only US increased by 25%. In his turn, Tom Lee, co-founder and financial analyst at Fundstrat Global Advisors, in an interview with CNBC stated that he believes the Bitcoin will rise in price to $15,000 by the end of 2018. He justifies his forecasts by the fact that the fair value of the cryptocurrency should be at least 2.5 times higher than the cost of its mining. Building on the point of self-sustainability Tom Lee is confident in his forecasts, despite the negative situation in the cryptocurrency market and the bitcoin price slide to $4582. Not so long ago, another crypto guru and programmer John McAfee made a similar assumption based on his many years of experience.  We support the views of analysts since their previous forecasts were true or close to the truth, and agree with them that there is a need to involve new personnel in the crypto industry, blockchain specialists, experienced developers who will be able to bring cryptocurrencies to an entirely new level, the one they deserve.  We support this initiative, as we believe that the Crypto Freelance Marketplace service of Crypt-ON platform will help to organize cooperation between employers and freelancers. Only by creating a better working environment for blockchain specialists can we talk about the severe interest of institutional investors who are ready to invest into the cryptocurrency and blockchain.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Turbo bounty from Crypt-ON: Round 3  Hello, community!  As promised, we continue the Turbo bounty, and today the 3rd round begins!  We remind you the rules: 10 percent of the total bounty pool will be distributed over the next 10 weeks — 1% each week. Starting this week, every Friday in the bounty chat will place a task that will need to be done within the next five days; after which the participants of the current stage of the turbo-bounty, who completed the task following the described terms receive their stacks. Each round will start on Friday and last 6 calendar days, until Wednesday of the next week incl.  Thus, the deadline for sending the task report of the 3rd round is November 26, 23 hours 59 minutes GMT.  So, here is the task of the 3rd round of Turbo bounty from Crypt-ON!  Reputable crypto media TheCoinshark included Crypt-ON the list of the three best investment projects this fall. We suggest you be creative and write a post (at least 500 characters) about why Crypt-ON is worthy to be in this rating and why you should pay attention to it right now.  Task report must contain links confirming the execution! Otherwise, the report is not accepted, and the task is considered to be failed.  Bonus! In addition to the stacks received for completing the task in the past stage, at the end of each round we will randomly play 250 real US dollars (in BTC equivalent) between the three lucky players: 120, 80 and 50 USD for the 1st, 2nd and 3rd places respectively!  Let’s pump Crypt-ON together! Join our bounty chat and earn more tokens!  Let’s keep in touch!  Crypt-ON team

Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hey sir. Yes, seemingly you are right, but we must take into account some necessary conditions:  1) A decentralized execution environment required for the execution of the contract. The Crypt-ON platform is ideal for this. Convenient Personal Account, fast operations, support of different cryptocurrencies — what is not the whole list of advantages offered by the platform. Soon, on crypt-on.io all users optionally will be able to issue smart contracts using the platform and Metamask independently. 2) Also, automatic bases for quick transactions and specialized tools for the execution of contracts needed. 3) Be sure to keep in mind that smart-contracts implemented not in all cryptocurrencies. You can use Crypt-ON platform if you make the deals in the I-Point, Stablecoin, Bitcoin (BTC), Litecoin (LTC) or Ethereum (ETH). Moreover, in the calculation in the I-Point, the fee is reduced by half.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Paul Andreev about Malta Blockchain Week: “Everything was just perfect!”  Most recently, one of the main and large-scale blockchain events of this year — Malta Blockchain Week, which brought together on the one platform the prominent, innovative startups of the crypto industry, has ended.  CEO of the Crypt-ON Paul Andreev, visiting this prestigious event, appreciated the level of its organization. He stressed that this event is significantly different from many of its kind in that it was attended exclusively by people involved in the industry, crypto-enthusiasts, trendsetters, eminent speakers, project managers and leaders of the crypto community. All of them came for the exchange of experience, networking, presentation of ideas and projects, and, of course, communication.  The atmosphere was inviting to communication, and our CEO found a common language with several investors who expressed their interest in the future of the Crypt-ON platform. Negotiations with them continue, and now, so we will inform you about developments.  Paul also had a short informal conversation with the Creator Of McAfee antivirus and a living legend of the crypto world John McAfee. John spoke positively about the Crypt-ON project and wished Paul success in further work on the project.  During working hours the conference discussed the prospects of replacing ICO with STO. In addition to a large number of different startups, a significant part of the participants represented by Maltese companies interested in attracting capital to Malta. Since all the participants literally “cheered” for the future of blockchain technology, the discussions were sometimes very large-scale and lively, not without polemic.  The entertainment program organized so perfectly that the course of time wasn’t noticed: the week passed as an instant.  Summarizing, we can say with confidence that the conference was successful: both in general and for the Crypt-ON project. The agreements reached should allow us to attract new investors shortly, and networking with other projects, reliable and reputable partners. And most importantly, thanks to such events, it becomes evident that the blockchain it is serious and for a long time. It is a future.

Author: SaprikMazhik
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Probably you know the main problems that prevent the more active development of the global market of P2P transactions using cryptocurrencies?

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Great question though. Well, as far as I know there are 3 main reasons. The issue of a single infrastructure solution for blockchain environment, limited market issue and matter of trust

Author: SaprikMazhik
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Sorry, but what do you mean by limited market issue?

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Unfortunately, not all goods or services and not in all countries can be purchased for the cryptocurrency. Many states and banking structures create all sorts of barriers on the way to integrate cryptocurrencies into the traditional economy. To solve this issue through direct interaction between market participants, it is necessary to overcome two main obstacles: the problem of trust and a high volatility level of digital assets...

Author: SaprikMazhik
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Ok, I see the point. So it is a way different from matter of trust, right?

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Oh yes, matter of trust is a bit different. Since people are not familiar personally and there are no usual intermediaries in the face of the public institutions, the banking system, and others, the problem of reliability of partners and verification of their financial cleanliness is acute. This is especially true in the blockchain environment and the use of cryptocurrencies, where users remain anonymous. And this is basically the problem of trust

Author: SaprikMazhik
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Ooh, got the difference. Seems that this one is quite important. And what was the third one? I mean what is that about? If you have more details, of course

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Well, the issue of a single infrastructure solution for blockchain environment. Today, there is no platform with a simple and clear interface that would allow implementing the most important/relevant operations with using cryptocurrencies within a single site. The crypto community needs a single solution that will provide ample opportunities for work and business: make secure trades, directly lend/borrow, seek independent specialists / remote work, exchange cryptocurrencies for fiat money and vice versa—all this on the basis of smart-contracts, taking into account the individual cryptographically protected trust rating. So really transparent and secured

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Start 2nd Stage of Crypt-ON TGE  The most important event of the end of the week is the start of the 2nd stage of the Crypt-ON project TGE. By the end of stage 1, our project raised $1.166.370, and we sincerely thank everyone for their support!  We remind you that the Crypt-ON is a p2p platform, built with the use of blockchain technologies for secure trades in cryptocurrency, is useful for entrepreneurs, startups, project managers, headhunters, freelancers, crypto-investors and everyone who carries out operations with cryptocurrencies.  Today, November 16 the second stage of TGE starts, which will last until November 30. The planned maximum volume of IPT tokens for sale is up to $4,000,000. The discount on tokens is 10%, and the cost of one IPT token in dollar equivalent is $0.09. It is still an excellent opportunity to become a token holder at a reasonable price.  The minimum volume of token purchase in dollar equivalent shouldn’t be less than 50 USD. FIAT, BTC, ETH, LTC, DASH, BCH, BTG are accepted.  What is needed? * Register on the website https://ico.crypt-on.io/ * Pass verification in your Personal Account by providing documents confirming your identity. * Pay for I-Point tokens by making a transfer to the specified address.  If you need help in purchasing tokens — join the project telegram chat, and we definitely will help you.  Many people ask if TGE could end ahead of time. The answer is Yes, maybe, subject to the raising of the maximum amount of $16,000,000.  The received funds will be evenly distributed for product development and promotion according to the financial plan.  So, TGE must go on! Are you in? Crypt-ON team

Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Crypt-ON platform poll results  Hi, community!  It’s time to sum up the results of the contest-poll from Crypt-ON, which means now we know the names of lucky ones who will receive a cash reward. Let’s remind poll conditions: participants had to answer three simple questions in our Telegram chat: https://t.me/Crypt_ON_En How did you know about Crypt-ON project? Have you acquired i-Point tokens? Do you plan to purchase i-Point tokens?  It’s been 24 hours, and we took stock of the draw using a random number generator, which helped us to define the winners:  1. RJ Bittu - 100$ 2. Sarowar Jahan - 90$ 3. Berkayy.kaya58 - 80$ 4. Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: The results of 1 Stage of TGE  It’s such a pleasure to start something new, but more pleasant to sum up results, even interim. The finish of the 1st stage of Crypt-ON TGE is just the beginning of a platform long journey, which already drew the attention of the world crypto community. During stage 1, everyone who understood in time what was in the right place at the right time was able to acquire IPT tokens at a favorable price, only $0.085 for 1 token.  Let us remind you that Crypt-ON is a p2p platform built with the use of blockchain technologies to ensure transactions in cryptocurrency, useful for entrepreneurs, startups, project managers, headhunters, freelancers, crypto-investors and everyone who carries out operations with cryptocurrencies.  Everyone who has already joined Crypt-ON has received a double benefit: · became a member of the platform · bought tokens at a low price.  The conditions were very attractive: · Discount on IPT tokens was 15% · The cost of 1 IPT token is only $ 0.085  In the course of TGE Crypt-ON, that took place from October 31 to November 15, $ 1,166,370 was collected  Tokens are credited to the accounts of 672 TGE members, now being officially users of the platform.  The end of TGE is scheduled for 01/21/2019 and you still have the opportunity to invest in the project, who is predicted a great future by many experts and industry opinion leaders.  Today stage 2 of TGE started. To join the project and have time to buy tokens at a price of $ 0.09, you need: Register on the website https://crypt-on.io  Pass verification in your Personal Account by providing documents confirming your identity.  If you need help in purchasing tokens — join our English or Russian telegram chat, and we definitely will help you.  Crypt-ON team

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Digest of changes in the project: October  The Crypt-ON is rapidly gaining momentum, implementing a variety of promotion methods. Our social media presence doesn’t go unnoticed. The crypto community has already begun to realize that by cooperating with us you can receive a generous reward. What is only the recent launch turbo-bounty worth? In just a few actions and a little activity, you can get a decent reward from $50 to $120 (in BTC equivalent). The first three lucky ones have already received an honestly earned cryptocurrency.  Attention! We remind you that the Turbo-bounty will be held weekly. Detailed information about terms of participation can be found here: https://medium.com/@Crypt__ON/turbo-bounty-from-crypt-on-round-1-deec3737173b!  By the way, about the rewards. Already today, ten lucky winners will become owners of $10 to $100, just by taking a poll in our Telegram chat. You can also take part in the poll, but hurry up; the results will be announced on November 15 at 12.00 (UTC+3)  Our airdrop suspended recently. The reason is trivial, there are a lot of participants, and we need to check all the results before tokens charging. Next week we will announce the date when the tokens will be credited to your wallet. Today, a little more than 18,000 people took part in the airdrop from Crypt-ON. Thank you all for your activity!  In parallel, work on the product is underway. Crypt-ON in its MVP combined quite an extended functionality of the future services of the platform; we do not stand still and continue to improve our product. The most significant changes that have been made recently can be called: the dashboard of arbitrators added, in which the administrator can find out how many transactions the arbitrator has made, and most importantly — in what status they are (arbitration, completed, unsuccessful), also in this dashboard you can see reviews about the arbitrator. The mechanism of the transaction changed. If the arbitrator in the trade is chosen to be Crypt-ON, then only signatures from the buyer and the seller are required in this transaction.  We invite everyone to take part in testing MVP of Crypt-ON platform. It will not only help us to identify existing shortcomings/bugs of the product and take into account all the needs of users, but also bring you a nice bonus in the form of IPT tokens.  October, like September, was filled with bright events, meetings, negotiations, conferences, which helped us to understand that the team is moving in the right direction. So, for the past two weeks, Crypt-ON CEO Paul Andreev visited two important events: international forum Blockchain Life in St. Petersburg in company with our head of SMM Department Andrey Maxunov and Malta Blockchain Week, where he managed to establish contact with significant investors who are interested in the Crypt-ON project. They have expressed their intention to invest in it (for privacy reasons to comply with the formalities, we do not disclose the names of our future business partners). Did not stay away from the events of October IR-project Manager Paul Almazov who visited the World Crypto Con in Las Vegas, where he held some important meetings with American investors and potential partners. Results of the negotiations will be announced later.  Stay in touch;) Crypt-ON team

Author: eleonora0x
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hey friend. The process works the following way:  1. The customer places a request with a description of the task. For the convenience of customers and performers, a searching system provides a selection by rating and allows you to find a highly qualified performer quickly or to have an idea of the customer’s reliability. 2. At the same time, the customer’s account must have enough i-Point tokens to pay for the contractor’s services; otherwise, he will not be able to publish the task. 3. Performers submit applications. 4. Customers consider candidates and confirm their choice. The contractor and the customer specify in advance the terms of a deal recorded in the smart-contract. 5. The task goes to work. After its execution, the contractor sends the results of the work for verification. 6. Payment for the finished service/work is carried out in i-Point tokens. 7. If the work had been violated the conditions fixed in the smart contract, an arbitrator includes in the dispute resolution. The arbitrator acts as a third party in the multi-signature of the smart-contract. 8. All actions of the parties are stored in the smart-contract and affect the reputation of both the customer and the contractor, changing their rating.  As from my point of view, quite simple and understandable

Body: Turbo Bounty from Crypt-ON : Round 2   Hello, community!  Turbo bounty week 2 begins!  So, here is the task of the 2nd round of turbo-bounty from Crypt-ON!  1) Go to a Crypt-ON youtube channel (here (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCw20otlmR4AqTQA0C_IYUQA)), like and comment any of our videos.  2) repost any of the videos from the channel to the media of your choice.  Afterwards, submit throught the google form(https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1KJxLxApK3XJzOLBQPdWg3pYIyAptRguIgXCoW1j8YQ4/viewform?edit_requested=true) and keep waiting for the week to end  Bonus! We have prepared a special surprise for you! In addition to the stakes received for completing a task at the end of the each stage, we will randomly roll 250 real USD (in btc equivalent) between the three lucky ones: 120, 80 and 50 USD for the 1st, 2nd and 3rd places!  Remind the rules: 10 percent of the total bounty pool will be distributed over the next 10 weeks — 1% for each week. Starting this week, every Friday in the bounty chat we will post a task that will need to be completed in the next seven days. After that, all of the participants who have completed the task in compliance with the conditions described in the current stage of the turbo-bounty, will receive their stacks. Each round will begin on Friday and last for 5 calendar days, until Wednesday of the next week inclusive.  Let’s make the Crypt-ON stronger by working together! Join our bounty chat and earn more tokens!  Stay in touch;) Crypt-ON team

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: How much will bitcoin cost in 2019?   Do you still doubt the growth of the main cryptocurrency? However, the head of Galaxy Digital Mike Novogratz, as the legendary John McAfee, confident that the price of BTC will soar to $20 000  in 2019. And that all because institutional investors are interested in cryptocurrencies. Opinion leaders of the crypto community are sure that the development of blockchain technology and the launch of new platforms using innovative tools, such as Crypt-ON, will attract the new capital flows into the crypto industry.  Mike, as a successful crypto investor, has already made statements about the price increase. In last November, when bitcoin literally soared in price, he said that by the end of 2018 one should not be surprised at the rate of $40 000 for one bitcoin.  Why can we expect the growth of cryptocurrencies? According to Novogratz, the development of the regulatory framework for the cryptoindustry can become a reason for growth; it wipes out regulatory uncertainty that will deter fraudsters and will attract large investors.  Not all large investment companies share the view of Mike Novogratz; only a few agreed to create a legal framework for their projects. Lawyers of the Crypt-ON project have been working on the creation of a stable, reliable and legitimate legal basis for several months. We are in favor your funds invested in the project to be protected and work for its development.  You still can manage to purchase IPT tokens with a 15% discount valid for two days remaining until the end of stage 1 of TGE.  Crypt-ON team

To take part in our survey, you need to answer 3 simple questions in our Telegram chat:  How did you know about Crypt-ON project?  1 — bounty campaign or airdrop 2 — social media 3 — banner ads 4 — ICO rating/listing 5 — media 6 — from someone else  Have you acquired i-Point tokens?  1 — yes 2 — no  Do you plan to purchase i-Point tokens?  1) yes, more than $50 2) yes, more than $250 3) yes, more than $1000 4) no  After 24 hours we will take stock and choose the winners using the random number generator. Prizes will be distributed as follows:  🔹10 place — 10$ 🔹9 place — 20$ 🔹8 place — 30$ 🔹7 place — 40$ 🔹6 place — 50$ 🔹5 place — 60$ 🔹4 place — 70$ 🥉3 place — 80$ 🥈2 place — 90$ 🥇1 place — 100$  Keep in touch Crypt-ON team

Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: The finish line of Crypt-ON TGE Stage 1 is soon  Less than a week left until the completion of the 1st stage of TGE from Crypt-ON. It is great news and an opportunity for those who have not yet managed to buy IPT tokens at a favorable price, only $0.085 for one token.  Crypt-ON is a p2p platform built with the use of blockchain technologies to ensure transactions in cryptocurrency, useful for entrepreneurs, startups, project managers, headhunters, freelancers, crypto-investors and everyone who carries out operations with cryptocurrencies. What do those who join the platform before the TGE is complete get?  They become a member of the project and will be able to benefit from buying tokens at a low price. The minimum purchase amount is equivalent to 50 USD; you can pay with BTC, ETH, and LTC.  What is needed? * Register on the website https://crypt-on.io * Pass verification in your Personal Account by providing documents confirming your identity. * Pay for I-Point tokens by making a transfer to the specified address.  Currently, the discount on IPT tokens is 15%. However, there is less than a week left until the completion of stage 1 of TGE, which means that the price will rise soon.  If you need help in purchasing tokens – join the project telegram chat, and we definitely will help you.  Crypt-ON team

Body: St. Petersburg brought together the best of the best in the field of blockchain technology, mining and ICO  The largest international forum Blockchain Life 2018 going on in St. Petersburg these days. The forum brought together large entrepreneurs, investors, startup managers, all those interested in blockchain projects and cryptocurrency. Crypt-ON will be presented by CEO Paul Andreev, who will talk about the mission of the project and the current challenges facing the team.  All reports are informational in nature, the purpose of the forum is to show the practical use of the accumulated knowledge to make money from cryptocurrencies and investments in ICO projects.  Among the speakers of the event have already noted Bitcoin.com CEO Roger Ver, with whom Paul has already met during the blockchain conference in Malta. As well as many other well-known international crypto community representatives, with whom Crypt-ON CEO would be able not only to get acquainted, but also to talk about his project.  If you are an investor and are in search of new promising investments - please contact Paul and ask any questions. Do not miss the opportunity to get acquainted with the project, which is already drew attention of large investors from America and Europe.  Stay in touch! Crypt-ON team

Author: cantap
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: The variety of projects in the market of blockchain startups is quite conditional, and, on closer examination, a lot of projects have an affinity in many aspects. Deployed detailed road-map, carefully structured white-paper with a beautiful corporate design, an exorbitant number of advisors and mentors. Above all, most of them have nothing to offer potential investors except promises and beautiful slogans about decentralization and the new digital economy. However, other startups come to tokensale having working MVP (minimum viable product). One of them is the Crypt-ON, which is due to its final MVP compares favorably with startups that draw magical prospects only on paper. In confirmation, we can cite data from the ICORating portal: 46.6% of the total ICO projects for the first quarter of 2018 did not have an MVP at all, 15.5% created an alpha version of the product, 11.2%-a beta version, 0.5% of projects had a primary code. Thus, only 26.2% of projects had final MVP.  Crypt-ON in its MVP combined quite an extended functionality of future platform services. At the moment, we have implemented the functionality of transactions creating and tracking, which allows users to exchange goods and services with each other freely. Transactions in the test (demo) mode can store various information relating to the participants, including their correspondence.  As we have previously stated, it is possible to appeal to third parties to resolve disputes arising in the course of the transaction between the parties. Now users have the opportunity to choose a qualified expert from the catalog, which gradually swells with new names.  For further successful evolving we plan to implement a program of close interaction with users. The main task of this program will be to get feedback for the generating and testing of hypotheses for the further development of the product. We currently implemented a form to contact the resource manager to infill the catalog of the arbitrators’ skills and determination of their areas of expertise. Nevertheless, this is not enough. Obviously, it is necessary to implement a more detailed scheme of interaction, that minimizes the total time spent on the iteration.  We invite everyone to take part in Crypt-ON platform MVP testing. It will not only help us to identify the current shortcomings of the product and take into account all the needs of users, but also bring you a nice bonus in the form of IPT tokens.  To participate in testing follow this link: https://main.crypt-on.io/.  Let’s make our platform better together!  This is what Crypt-On posted some time ago, so you should definitely have a look at their MVP

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Fall blockchain conferences in the Crypt-ON project life.   This fall was very eventful for the Crypt-ON project. Blockchain Cruise Mediterranian, Malta Blockchain week, a World Crypto Con conference in Las Vegas… It looks like an excellent start for an innovative startup, that has already attracted the attention of many blockchain enthusiasts and investors. The Crypt-ON project already has an interest not only for private investors but also the whole investor pools.  CEO Paul Andreev and IR Manager Paul Almazov during various blockchain events met with significant and authoritative people of the crypto industry — the legendary John McAfee and crypto guru Charlie Lee, bitcoin Jesus Roger Ver and CEO of the Binance exchange Changpeng Zhao. Whey held talks with several large investors who saw in Crypt-ON not only a platform for making secure trades in cryptocurrency but also a significant investment project with serious prospects. Some of them have already purchased IPT tokens during the pre-TGE stage.  If you want to take part in TGE, make an offer about joint work, or learn more about the project, you just need to know that Crypt-ON team is open for dialogue. Everyone can ask any question as online so in person at one of the upcoming conferences, which are planned to be visited by the team members. Follow the project development and news in social networks, and join the Crypt-ON  group in Telegram.  It’s only the beginning!

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Well, today, the capabilities of modern smartphones already allow making complex financial decisions, and the new generation of applications makes services such as online shopping or money transfers faster, cheaper and more accurate than traditional services. The possibilities of this market are enormous. BI Intelligence estimates that globally the peer – to – peer transfer market is already valued at more than $ 1 trillion, and only a small part of these transactions-just $5 billion in the US, for example-are now conducted via mobile phones. The total volume of mobile P2P transactions in the US is expected to reach $86 billion in 2018

Author: SellnBuy037
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: And what are these advantages of P2P interactions? Why is that becoming more and more popular?

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: The main advantage of the P2P interaction model in transactions and loans is the elimination of an intermediary such as a bank, a notary, or a lawyer who complicates transactions between people with a lot of papers and questionnaires to be completed and the need to provide confirmations and guarantees. Interest rates, terms, requirements for documents, and procedures for filing are established solely by these intermediaries

Author: SellnBuy037
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: In this case I believe P2P will probably also help to solve some problems that may occur among users. Thank you, became more clear for me now

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: World Crypto Con Crypto-conference and the future of digital assets  From October 31 to November 2, Las Vegas hosted the World Crypto Con crypto-conference, which gathered crypto-enthusiasts from around the world. Crypt-ON platform IR Paul Almazov couldn't miss this event. He had an excellent opportunity to hear to the speeches of the Bitcoin Fund Chairman Brock Pierce and its founder Charlie Shrem, Litecoin founder Charlie Lee and others. Why did such a large-scale conference start on October 31? All because this day Bitcoin was celebrating its 10th anniversary, and skipping this a was disrespectful to the digital currency at least.  The active position of some speakers was interesting not only to a narrow circle of traders but also to the entire crypto-community. So programmer and Creator of Litecoin cryptocurrency Charlie Lee in last December sold all his digital money. In an interview with CNBC, he noted that today the value of cryptocurrencies is more speculative, but in the long term, everything can change dramatically. According to his forecasts, Bitcoin will return to the maximum in just six months. Why does Charlie not plan to buy cryptocurrency, including Bitcoin? He said that he had sold all his assets because of conflicting interests, and will not buy them, but advises to take a closer look to cryptocurrencies for those who plan to invest.  Charlie Lee once again drew attention to the necessity to scale the cryptocurrency, and it uses more as a means of payment than accumulation.  By these words, he unobtrusively supported the Crypt-ON platform, the main task of which is to create a business environment where everyone can conduct secure transactions in cryptocurrency, use p2p exchanger, hire people to work and pay for their work, borrow, and all these using cryptocurrency.  Only through joint efforts, using digital assets as a means of payment, we will be able to give the green light to digital money.  It was digital assets that all the topics of the speakers of the blockchain conference in San Francisco were focused.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Crypt-ON partners with TOKPIE   This partnership aims to boost Crypt-ON bounty campaign and i-Point (IPT) Token Sale.  TOKPIE is the fast developing platform that provides, among other things, bounty stakes trading service to bounty hunters and early investors.  Crypt-ON  is a P2P platform built on blockchain technology to provide safe and secure trades in cryptocurrency. Crypt-ON is aimed at a wide range of users — from beginner crypto-enthusiasts and freelancers to investors and managers of blockchain projects. This is a place where people meet, make deals, get loans for their projects, exchange digital assets for money, and look for  work or performers for their tasks, all by using cryptocurrency for payments.  To facilitate the Crypt-ON Bounty Campaign and Token Sale, TOKPIE will allow current and future hunters engaged to the Crypt-ON Blog & Media bounty to deposit up to 50% of their stakes as soon as they earned (weekly) and exchange for ETH on the TOKPIE platform.  Crypt-ON CEO, Paul Andreev, said: “We believe the additional exposure to TOKPIE’s community is the perfect match for us to ensure the successful running of our bounty campaign and i-Point (IPT) token sale.’’  TOKPIE CEO, Vasilii Silin added: ‘’TOKPIE are very pleased to be partnering with Crypt-ON and the opportunity to attract new users to our platform as well as introducing the Crypt-ON Token sale to our existing audience.’’  The Crypt-ON token sale has already been a huge success, with vast coverage in the online crypto media and almost closed Soft Cap.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: John McAfee's forecasts and the future of Crypt-ON  Blockchain Summit in Malta, held on November 1 and 2, brought together many participants, including opinion leaders. As we already told earlier, Crypt-ON CEO Paul Andreev came to the summit in order to present the Crypt-ON project to a wide audience. But furthermore, he was able to converse with some potential investors, and with some bright trendsetters of a crypto industry. In particular, upon arrival, he accidentally ran into John McAfee - the man who for half a century excites the public and financial markets for his forecasts and shocking statements.    Not so long ago, a well-known programmer and entrepreneur said that soon BTC will reach quotes of $15 thousand per coin. Can we trust him? It's up to you, but John is considered a man who knows how to analyze the situation in the world of cryptocurrencies and make the right conclusions.  By the way, this is not the first forecast of John McAfee regarding the bitcoin price increase. It is well known another his forecast, according to which he assures that in 2020 BTC will reach $1 million per coin. And John is very sure about it, well, you know. )  John McAfee believes in cryptocurrencies, writes a lot about it on his Twitter, and takes active steps to promote the digital asset. His entire estate blockchain enthusiast buys only for cryptocurrencies and encourages others to use it actively when making transactions.  After acquaintance between Paul Andreev and John McAfee, a dialogue was started during wherein they discussed the Crypt-ON project and its prospects. In informal conversation, John said he believes in the success of Crypt-ON because the financial world needs new platforms that can be used to cryptocurrency payments. We also believe in success and trust in that the words of McAfee will be prophetic for us, given the unique intuition that is helping him to correctly assess and predict the results of the most important events.  Stay in touch. Crypt-ON team

Author: eleonora0x
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: He is a British-American computer programmer and businessman. He founded the software company McAfee Associates in 1987 and ran it until 1994, when he resigned from the company. McAfee Associates achieved early success as the creators of McAfee, the first commercial antivirus software, and the business now produces a range of enterprise security software. The company was renamed to Intel Security in 2011 after being purchased by Intel, though the software still retains the McAfee brand name. McAfee's wealth peaked in 2007 at $100 million, before his investments plummeted in the global financial crisis that began that year  This is from Wikipedia!

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Turbo Bounty from Crypt-ON : Round 1  Hello, community!  As promised, we are launching a turbo bounty, and today the first round begins!  And here is how it's going to be: 10 percent of the total bounty pool will be distributed over the next 10 weeks - 1% for each week. Starting this week, every Friday in the bounty chat we will post a task that will need to be completed in the next seven days. After that, all of the participants who have completed the task in compliance with the conditions described in the current stage of the turbo-bounty, will receive their stacks. Each round will begin on Friday and last for 5 calendar days, until Wednesday of the next week inclusive.  Thus, the deadline for sending a report on the fulfillment of the task of the 1st round is November 7, 23 hours GMT.  So, here is the task of the 1st round of turbo-bounty from Crypt-ON! 1) Make a selfie on the background of a computer, tablet or smartphone screen with a crypt-on.io site open on it and show a a 'thumbs up' with your hand 👍🏻 , then place on your page on one of the social networks to choose from (Facebook | Twitter | Reddit) 2) Log into the Crypt-ON page on Medium, and give at least 30 applauds to the article about the results of the pre-TGE https://medium.com/@Crypt__ON/first-the-lets-discuss-the-results-of-the-pre-tge-stage-of-our-project-6b0caa1eef2b at least 30 times and make a repost on any of the social networks (Facebook | Twitter)  A report on the fulfillment of the task must contain urls confirming the fulfillment of 1 and 2 items of the task! Otherwise, the report is not accepted and the task is considered unfulfilled.  Bonus! We have prepared a special surprise for you! In addition to the stakes received for completing a task at the end of the each stage, we will randomly roll 250 real USD (in btc equivalent) between the three lucky ones: 120, 80 and 50 USD for the 1st, 2nd and 3rd places!  Let's make the Crypt-ON stronger by working together! Join our bounty chat and earn more tokens!  Stay in touch;)   Crypt-ON team

Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: In few words - Crypt-ON is a P2P platform built on blockchain technology to provide safe and secure trades in cryptocurrency! Body: Blockchain Summit on Malta   Launched today in Malta, the Blockchain Summit brought together many crypto-enthusiasts, investors, developers — all for whom the blockchain is the future of the world economy, a source of generating and implementing new effective tools for managing values that will make our lives easier and more comfortable over time. The main topics of the reports announced at the summit were a protection of blockchain projects from hacker attacks and hacks, development of new technological solutions to protect startups and existing blockchain projects.  Paul Andreev, CEO of the Crypt-ON, attended here as a speaker and told the summit participants about the Crypt-ON platform, its capabilities, and prospects, as well as the benefits that each user will receive. The report of our CEO attracted the attention of the audience, and the project itself generated interest among a group of private investors who wanted to get acquainted with the project in more detail.  Any interested participant of the summit can personally hang out with Paul, and he will be happy to answer all your questions and share his immediate plans.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Yes, you can find this information on the site. Right now, our CEO Paul Andreev is at the summit in Malta

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: This afternoon Paul Andreev spoke at one of the largest conferences of this autumn - Malta Blockchain Week.  As we said in the previous post, Paul presented our project to a huge audience and many participants of the event were interested in our project. One of them was the investor Claudio Ceruti, who agreed on a business dinner with our CEO.  Keep in touch.  Crypt-ON team

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hot October for Crypt-ON: pre-TGE results   First, the lets discuss the results of the pre-TGE stage of our project! In the course of pre-TGE Crypt-ON, that took place from October 1 to October 30, 884,750 USD was collected. Hundreds of crypto enthusiasts from more than 40 countries in the world have participated in the pre-TGE stage of our project. We went through an important part of the journey, which showed how much crypto-enthusiast community believes in our project. And, despite the fact that we have not collected exactly 1 million, we believe that with the current state of the cryptocurrency market, in conditions of a protracted downtrend, we showed excellent results.  Our developers, working tirelessly, continued to work on MVP, because we as a team understand that there is a gap between the beautifully laid out idea and product that you can test and evaluate. During pre-TGE Crypt-ON launch, large cryptomedia resources like Bitcoinist, FX Empire, The CoinShark, Coinspeaker had written about our project.  Communities of our followers in social networks demonstrated impressive growth:  ★ Our Twitter community has grown to 8,700 followers!  ★ Reddit is also slowly growing, there are already almost 2000 of us!  ★ The Facebook community has over 10,000 members!  ★ Today’s Crypt-ON Telegram Community has 17,000 active users!  ★ On bitcointalk.com there are already over 5500 views of our topic!  And yet, over the month, more than 13,000 people took part in the Airdrop from Crypt-ON. And theu will receive their IPT tokens very soon. Starting tomorrow, we will launch a new mini campaign: turbo-bounty, participation in which will allow not only to earn IPT tokens, but also to participate in weekly draws for 250 USD!  A number of big and trustworthy rating platforms had a look at our project, and many experts have left positive feedback.         Now let’s talk about our events.  We had a number of conferences with cryptocurrency exchange parties, and we have reached with some of them positive preliminary agreement. For obvious reasons, we cannot disclose details. We can only declare that active negotiations with various trading platforms continue in November.  Paul Andreev, the CEO of Crypt-ON have visited a number of major blockchain-events in October, where he interacted with many potential partners and investors, as well as industry leaders such as Changpeng Zhao and Roger Ver. New events and new photo stories are waiting for you in November.   We remind you that on October 31st, the first stage of the TGE started, and it will last until November 15th. The maximum amount of IPT tokens for sale: up to threshold of $ 2 000 000. Discount on tokens will be 15%, and the cost of one token IPT in dollar equivalent — $ 0.085. The minimum purchase amount of tokens in dollar equivalent should not be less than 50 USD.  We really appreciate feedback from our community, so We ask you to answer 5 simple questions that will help us to improve our work  Please complete the straw poll: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdkRT7avR7qk6aCNvnTQr3V2TFseVe3Iqo_r1UhE3XlFSN02w/viewform  _____________________________  Thank you all for your support!  And congratulations, now you are part of the project Crypt-ON!  Stay in touch;) Crypt-ON team

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hello, community!  Our team has a rule - there is no limit to perfection. Of course, this doesn't mean that we are crazy perfectionists (perhaps some of us ) But, it means that we are continuously working on improvements in any possible cases and aspects. And this doesn't only reflect on the product itself, but it also affects all of the promotions within the project, as well as working with the community.  We are open to everything new. We do not rely on traditional strategies / formats and try to be at the forefront of all trends not only in our product, but also in our marketing.  And we thought, what could be more awesome than bounty campaigns? That's right, only turbo bounty!  And here is how it's going to be: 10 percent of the total bounty pool will be distributed over the next 10 weeks - 1% for each week. Starting this week, every Friday in the bounty chat we will post a task that will need to be completed in the next seven days. After that, all of the participants who have completed the task in compliance with the conditions described in the current stage of the turbo-bounty, will receive their stacks.  But that's only one part of the picture! We have prepared a special surprise, for you! In addition to the stacks received for completing a task at the end of each stage, we will randomly play 250 real dollars between three lucky ones: 120, 80 and 50 USD for the 1st, 2nd and 3rd places respectively!  So what's up community, how do you like our turbo bounty? Let's make the Crypt-ON stronger, by working together! Join our bounty chat and earn more tokens!  Stay in touch;)  Crypt-ON team
