Author: XxX_ZORG_XxX
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: The issue of a single infrastructure solution for blockchain environment. Today, there is no platform with a simple and clear interface that would allow implementing the most important/relevant operations with using cryptocurrencies within a single site. The crypto community needs a single solution that will provide ample opportunities for work and business: make secure trades, directly lend/borrow, seek independent specialists / remote work, exchange cryptocurrencies for fiat money and vice versa—all this on the basis of smart-contracts, taking into account the individual cryptographically protected trust rating

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hello. The IPT token is not a cryptocurrency or any financial instrument but a prepaid service for using the Crypt-ON platform. It is an internal payment instrument, used in payments for the Crypt-ON assistance services: - concluding secure trades - finding employment/specialists - searching for loans - conducting the cryptocurrency-to-fiat exchange between platform users/participants.  You can find more information about IPT token functionality on page 43 of the WhitePaper.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Imagine a world that belongs to everyone, there is no vertical hierarchy and corruption, and the powers are distributed among all participants. A world of equal opportunities. Without bureaucracy and without borders.  The concept of DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organizations) fits perfectly into the project in accordance with its mission – creation of a global workspace for a cryptocommunity. And with the platform transition to decentralized management, all decisions will be made by the community of token holders.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Start of Crypt-ON TGE   The start of the Crypt-ON project TGE is the most important event of this week for both the team and the community. During the pre-TGE that ended yesterday, our project raised $ 884,750, and we sincerely thank everyone for their support!  Today, October 31 the first stage of TGE starts, and it will last until November 15. The planned maximum volume of IPT tokens for sale is up to $2,000,000. The tokens will be sold with a 15% discount, and the cost of one IPT token in USD equivalent will be $0.085. It is still an excellent opportunity to become a token holder at reasonable terms.  The second stage will last from 11/16/2018 to 11/30/2018. The maximum volume of IPT tokens for sale: up to $4 000 000. The tokens price discount is 10%. The nominal value of one IPT token in USD equivalent will be $0.09.  The third TGE stage also lasts two weeks: from 12/01/2018 to 12/15/2018  The maximum amount of tokens for sale is up to the raising $12 000 000. The cost of one IPT token in USD equivalent will be $0,1.  The last, fourth stage TGE will continue from 12/16/2018 till 01/21/2019. However, TGE may come to an end earlier, subject to the raising of the maximum amount of $16 000 000. The cost of one IPT token in the equivalent will be $0.12.  The minimum volume of token purchase in dollar equivalent should not be less than 50 USD. We accept payment in BTC, ETH, LTC, DASH, BCH, BTG.  The resulting amount will be evenly distributed for product development and promotion.  So, let the TGE begin!  Crypt-ON team

Author: XxX_ZORG_XxX
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Well, unfortunately, not all goods or services and not in all countries can be purchased for the cryptocurrency. Many states and banking structures create all sorts of barriers on the way to integrate cryptocurrencies into the traditional economy. To solve this issue through direct interaction between market participants, it is necessary to overcome two main obstacles: the problem of trust and a high volatility level of digital assets

Author: ferdi252
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: So is it a way different from matter of trust?

Author: XxX_ZORG_XxX
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Oh yes, matter of trust is a way different. Since people are not familiar personally and there are no usual intermediaries in the face of the public institutions, the banking system, and others, the problem of reliability of partners and verification of their financial cleanliness is acute. This is especially true in the blockchain environment and the use of cryptocurrencies, where users remain anonymous. And this is basically the problem of trust

Author: cantap
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hello, Jack! Due to a large number of registrations and the influx of applications, the Crypt-ON security department does not have time to check and process all the received information. Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Visa payment system can start working with cryptocurrencies   What cards do you use: Visa or Mastercard? So how you feel about the fact that shortly Visa payment system can start working with bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies? It would be the best news for the crypto industry and perhaps it will happen soon.  By the way, in October this year, Visa has already announced the integration of Hyperledger Fabric blockchain technology in their cross-border payments service B2B Connect. It is an excellent affirmation that cryptocurrencies slowly but surely displace fiat money from the sphere of finance. By the way, this is said not only by crypto-gurus, whose opinion is notable just for people involved in the crypto industry but also by people who not directly connected with cryptocurrencies, as Al Kelly — CEO of Visa.  In an interview with CNBC, he expressed the opinion that if digital assets are recognized, the payment giant is ready to start working with cryptocurrencies. He noted that at the moment, cryptocurrencies needs to “move from being a commodity to really being a payment instrument.”  Simultaneously, he said, if crypto “goes in [the] direction [of fiat]” Visa will also “move in that direction. We want to be in the middle of every payment flow in the world.” The Crypt-ON team is also sure that sooner or later cryptocurrencies will be able to displace Fiat money thanks to blockchain technology, and we are doing everything to become one of the largest and most successful financial blockchain projects of this year.  By the way, today you have the last chance to buy IPT tokens at the most favorable price with a 20% discount.  Keep for updates. Thank you all for your support!  Crypt-ON team

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: I can help you out with that   There are the following 4 aspects:  - Service to assist in secure trades through an independent arbitrator (escrow) It provides the ability to conduct any type of secure trade using cryptocurrency. The insurance of transactions will serve as additional protection of interests of all parties.  - Service to assist in finding and obtaining loans (P2P lending) It provides the opportunity to borrow/lend in cryptocurrencies on mutually beneficial terms without the participation of an intermediary. The use of a rating system that determines the level of reliability of potential borrowers will reduce the number of defaults to a minimum.  - Service to assist in finding employment/specialists (crypto-freelance job exchange) It provides independent professionals in the field of the crypto industry the possibility of finding remote work, and companies or projects—the possibility of hiring such specialists. The parties can directly agree on the execution of various types of work, using the cryptocurrency in their calculations.  - Service to assist platform members in P2P cryptocurrency exchange without mediators. It provides users with the opportunity to exchange cryptocurrency for fiat money between themselves directly without the participation of an intermediary, using geotargeting to find contractors in their region.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: MVP in platform Crypt-ON   The variety of projects in the market of blockchain startups is quite conditional, and, on closer examination, a lot of projects have an affinity in many aspects. Deployed detailed road-map, carefully structured white-paper with a beautiful corporate design, an exorbitant number of advisors and mentors. Above all, most of them have nothing to offer potential investors except promises and beautiful slogans about decentralization and the new digital economy. However, other startups come to tokensale having working MVP (minimum viable product). One of them is the Crypt-ON, which is due to its final MVP compares favorably with startups that draw magical prospects only on paper. In confirmation, we can cite data from the ICORating portal: 46.6% of the total ICO projects for the first quarter of 2018 did not have an MVP at all, 15.5% created an alpha version of the product, 11.2%-a beta version, 0.5% of projects had a primary code. Thus, only 26.2% of projects had final MVP.  Crypt-ON in its MVP combined quite an extended functionality of future platform services. At the moment, we have implemented the functionality of transactions creating and tracking, which allows users to exchange goods and services with each other freely. Transactions in the test (demo) mode can store various information relating to the participants, including their correspondence.  As we have previously stated, it is possible to appeal to third parties to resolve disputes arising in the course of the transaction between the parties. Now users have the opportunity to choose a qualified expert from the catalog, which gradually swells with new names.  For further successful evolving we plan to implement a program of close interaction with users. The main task of this program will be to get feedback for the generating and testing of hypotheses for the further development of the product. We currently implemented a form to contact the resource manager to infill the catalog of the arbitrators’ skills and determination of their areas of expertise. Nevertheless, this is not enough. Obviously, it is necessary to implement a more detailed scheme of interaction, that minimizes the total time spent on the iteration.  We invite everyone to take part in Crypt-ON platform MVP testing. It will not only help us to identify the current shortcomings of the product and take into account all the needs of users, but also bring you a nice bonus in the form of IPT tokens.  To participate in testing follow this link: https://main.crypt-on.io/.  Let’s make our platform better together!  Crypt-ON team

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hello mate. Well, basically, P2P lending or peer-to-peer lending or crowdlending is a type of contractual loan relations, which excludes intermediaries in the face of banks and other financial institutions, charging a fee for the transaction. The main idea reflected in the name “P2P” — it also means "person-to-person"

Author: rafenfre
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Ok, pretty got the idea.. But what about commission rates in such deals?

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: All interaction based on competition for the lowest interest rate. P2P lending looks more profitable than traditional regarding saving time and additional costs for intermediaries fees. Because of this, it has become quite widespread with the development of the Internet!

Author: cantap
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: There are the following, friend:  1) Service to assist in secure trades through an independent arbitrator (escrow) It provides the ability to conduct any type of secure trade using cryptocurrency. The insurance of transactions will serve as additional protection of interests of all parties.  2) Service to assist in finding and obtaining loans (P2P lending) It provides the opportunity to borrow/lend in cryptocurrencies on mutually beneficial terms without the participation of an intermediary. The use of a rating system that determines the level of reliability of potential borrowers will reduce the number of defaults to a minimum.  3) Service to assist in finding employment/specialists (crypto-freelance job exchange) It provides independent professionals in the field of the crypto industry the possibility of finding remote work, and companies or projects—the possibility of hiring such specialists. The parties can directly agree on the execution of various types of work, using the cryptocurrency in their calculations.  4) Service to assist platform members in P2P cryptocurrency exchange without mediators. It provides users with the opportunity to exchange cryptocurrency for fiat money between themselves directly without the participation of an intermediary, using geotargeting to find contractors in their region.

Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Crypt-ON storms the BLOCKCHAIN island  At the early of November, BLOCKCHAIN WEEK will be held in Malta. No wonder this small country is already called the BLOCKCHAIN island. This is not the first time Malta brings together blockchain enthusiasts from all over the world. After the successful presentation of the Crypt-ON platform during the Mediterranean blockchain tour, after the summit in Ibiza, and the conference in Malta in late September, we saw that the Mediterranean brings good luck to the project. From 1 to 2 November, CEOs of major projects, blockchain enthusiasts, investors, and all who care about the future of blockchain technology and the crypto industry will come together at InterContinental Malta.  Paul Andreev, CEO of the Crypt-ON project, will also be attended at the event aimed at protecting blockchain projects from hacker attacks and hacks and developing new technological solutions for protecting startups and existing blockchain projects.  If you have heard about the Crypt-ON platform before and are interested in the progress of Its development, or just want to know more about it — we will be glad to hang out.  Contact the Crypt-ON frontman during a coffee break, and he will be happy to answer all your questions and share the nearest plans of the project team.

The Crypt-ON platform is ideal for this. Convenient Personal Account, fast operations, support of different cryptocurrencies — what is not the whole list of advantages offered by the platform. Soon, on crypt-on.io all users optionally will be able to issue smart contracts using the platform and Metamask independently. 2) Also, automatic bases for quick transactions and specialized tools for the execution of contracts needed. 3) Be sure to keep in mind that smart-contracts implemented not in all cryptocurrencies. You can use Crypt-ON platform if you make the deals in the I-Point, Stablecoin, Bitcoin (BTC), Litecoin (LTC) or Ethereum (ETH). Author: AwanishSu1
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hey mate. Geotargeting p2p exchange works like this. The seller or the buyer places an announcement in the system to sell or buy a some amount of the cryptocurrency. You can select yout transaction partner by using geolocation in the mobile app. System also checks the buyer's account for the necessary funds for the transaction. Then the parties discuss the terms of the deal, date and time and makes an appointment. Cryptocurrency rate is automatically calculated by the system. If the parties meet, the seller must confirm the cash / money transfer from the buyer in the mobile application, after which the system transfers the reserved cryptocurrency to the buyer's account

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: P2P lending in Crypt-ON platform   P2P lending or peer-to-peer lending or crowdlending is a type of contractual loan relations, which excludes intermediaries in the face of banks and other financial institutions, charging a fee for the transaction. The main idea reflected in the name “P2P” — it also means “person-to-person.” Such an online service is usually a site where potential lenders and borrowers find each other, stipulate the essential terms of the loan — terms, interest rate and others, and then conclude a deal with each other. All interaction based on competition for the lowest interest rate. P2P lending looks more profitable than traditional regarding saving time and additional costs for intermediaries fees. Because of this, it has become quite widespread with the development of the Internet.  Our platform also does not stand aside: one of the Crypt-ON services will help borrowers and lenders in finding each other. The process will be as follows. Firstly, the user places an announcement of willing to lend or borrow a certain amount and under certain conditions. The system automatically selects contractors, if the user is not satisfied with the proposed options, it is possible to choose the appropriate counterparty manually. After the parties agree on the terms of the lend and repayment, the system reserves the agreed amount on the lender’s account and forms a smart contract, which fixes all the terms of the transaction. Then both parties sign a smart-contract, and the funds credited to the borrower’s account.  The loan repaid automatically: at the end of the payment term, the funds debited from the borrower’s account. However, it is possible that the funds for repayment are not enough, then the conditions are considered unfulfilled, and the refund procedure started, which occurs in three stages. At the first stage, the system offers the parties to cancel the previous contract and conclude a new one on new terms. If at least one party does not agree, the system at the next stage offers the borrower to replenish the account within three days, and could, by consent of the borrower, automatically generate and place an ad on the search for a new loan to repay the current one. If these two stages do not solve the problem of repayment, the platform, by the consent of the lender, transfers this to external independent organizations for settlement of the dispute in the legal field of the relevant jurisdiction.  Today, P2P platforms firmly held among the fastest growing segments. The volume of p2p transactions is overgrowing with the development of mobile applications, it already exceeds $1 billion per year, and in the last few years shows a steady growth of 50–80%. According to economic forecasts, the total volume of p2p lending will grow from $60 billion in 2015 to $1 trillion in 2024. With the development of blockchain technology, such platforms as Crypt-ON can seriously compete with traditional financial institutions, as they offer an algorithm for direct interaction of participants and a rating system that will help to form an objective and transparent register of borrowers.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Let us tell you more about the trust token  Trust-token (reputational token) is the digital token containing records of all platform-user operations in the form of a trust rating. The reputation of the system participants will be determined through the trust token smart-contract. All user actions, transactions results, reviews, etc. will affect its rating. A trust token of a project participant can also be used by him/her on any other services. In fact, a trust token is a cryptographically secure rating of the reliability/trustworthiness of the user of the Crypt-ON system stored in a smart-contract. We assume the use of an external trust token released by one of the third-party specialized projects.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Insurance will be available for P2P-lending and Escrow services in respect of transactions carried out in I-Point tokens. The amount of the insurance premium will depend on the reputation/rating of the user wishing to use the insurance option and the amount of the transaction. Compensation for such trades in the case of an insured event will also be calculated and paid in I-Point tokens. Initially, the insurance fund will be formed from I-Point tokens generated during TGE in the amount of 20,000,000 , and then it will be replenished 3 from the fees on trades made with the platform services.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: What is the DAO in blockchain?   The “DAO” abbreviation means Decentralized Autonomous Organization. Based on the name, it can be understood that such organizations differ from the usual in autonomy and lack of centralized management. In such a system there is no vertical of power, there are no such institutions as the Board of Directors or the company owner. The power divided between all participants of the platform; in fact, there is a horizontal distribution of influence. This distribution becomes possible thanks to the development of blockchain technologies, which makes it possible to record all participants in a single open register, which is a guarantee of transparency of the processes taking place.  Autonomy achieved through the creation of a certain set of rules binding for all participants, an approved plan for the development of the platform and automatic execution of daily operations based on the program code. Decisions on the future development of the system made by Consensus, but decisions not formed randomly, but strictly per the development plan, where laid the foundations and vector of development of the organization. The” weight “ of a user’s vote usually determined by the number of platform tokens owned by the user. Than more he holds, the more weighty is his opinion. However, there may be other options for the distribution of effect on the organization development. So, by consensus, the most authoritative users can be elected who will be allowed to submit to the General discussion of the future stages of development. Thus, the system minimizes spam in the sphere of proposed solutions by itself.  Replacement fiat currency to cryptocurrency eliminates the reference to the traditional financial and political institutions, but does not exclude the cooperation with these institutions if it is needed.  It is also important to use smart contracts in the process of user interaction. In such contracts are fixed as rules and conditions of use of the system that are mandatory for execution by all participants, and personally customizable terms that are chosen by the participants of transactions. Automation of interaction between users eliminates unnecessary costs for legal support of operations.  Greater control over investments achieved through an equal share of each user’s participation in the organization. And this development of systems is promising, at least because such a structure is more reliable than the traditional one, by eliminating the influence of the human factor, as mistakes of managers or their dishonesty. Such errors are impossible if all users make decisions.  The use of DAO structure is also suitable for traditional corporations, where it is possible to replace the vertical structure of any Department. For example, the replacement of the financial Department will avoid fraud with the company’s budget and disputes with the remuneration of employees.  The possibility of joint development management, transparency of decision — making, minimizing the risks associated with the sole management of the system or the concentration of power in the hands of a narrow group of people — these are the reasons why our project includes such a crucial stage of evolution as the creation of DAO.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: In short, the Crypto freelance marketplace provides independent crypto-industry professionals with the ability to search for distant work, and companies and projects with the ability to hire such specialists. The parties can directly agree on the performance of various types of work using cryptocurrency in their calculations.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: The service allows companies/projects to find performers for specific volumes/types of work and independent specialists of different profiles/skill levels to perform work/provide services for the cryptocurrency. The convenient search engine and objective rating system will allow companies/projects and freelancers from around the world to quickly find each other and agree on terms of cooperation. The security of transactions, as well as the terms of working with other services of the platform, will be provided by a smart-contract. Payments for performed work and services will be made in IPT. You can learn more about how this process works in our WP on page 21: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ItcfVNhOnSiXhRlf-OIAjZDSnfJuIS66/view

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Crypt-ON FAQ  - What cryptocurrency can I occupy?  - Loans can be carried out in the following types of cryptocurrency: I-Point,Stablecoin,BTC,LTC,ETH *Return of funds is made in the same cryptocurrency, in which there was issued a loan.

Author: SaprikMazhik
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Super, will have a look on it! Thank you

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: I can also copy paste you in here, if it is more convenient for you! Cause it's at my fingertips  The process works the following way:  1. The customer places a request with a description of the task. For the convenience of customers and performers, a searching system provides a selection by rating and allows you to find a highly qualified performer quickly or to have an idea of the customer’s reliability. 2. At the same time, the customer’s account must have enough i-Point tokens to pay for the contractor’s services; otherwise, he will not be able to publish the task. 3. Performers submit applications. 4. Customers consider candidates and confirm their choice. The contractor and the customer specify in advance the terms of a deal recorded in the smart-contract. 5. The task goes to work. After its execution, the contractor sends the results of the work for verification. 6. Payment for the finished service/work is carried out in i-Point tokens. 7. If the work had been violated the conditions fixed in the smart contract, an arbitrator includes in the dispute resolution. The arbitrator acts as a third party in the multi-signature of the smart-contract. 8. All actions of the parties are stored in the smart-contract and affect the reputation of both the customer and the contractor, changing their rating.

It's excellent news and an opportunity for those who missed it to join and purchase an IPT token for just $0.08. Crypt-ON is a p2p platform built with the use of blockchain technologies to ensure transactions in cryptocurrency, helpful for entrepreneurs, startups, project managers, headhunters, freelancers, crypto-investors and everyone who carries out operations with cryptocurrencies. Attention! Already more than half of the planned amount raised and a few days early completion of PRE-TGE is possible. What do get those who join the platform before the PRE-TGE completed? Whey becomes members of the project and able to benefit by buying tokens at the lowest price at the start. The minimum purchase amount is equivalent to 50 USD; you can pay BTC, ETH, and LTC. What is needed? * Register on the website * Pass verification in your Personal Account by providing documents confirming your identity. * Pay for I-Point tokens by making a transfer to the specified address. Currently, the IPT tokens discount is 20%. However, less than two weeks left before the completion of pre-TGE, and soon the price will rise. If you need help in purchasing tokens – join the project Telegram chat , and we definitely will help you.  Crypt-ON team.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Roger Ver will start a new crypto exchange   Bitcoin Evangelist Roger Ver once again got the crypto community to recall his recent talking and intention to start his crypto-exchange. So Bitcoin.com CEO plans to acquire an existing platform or find a partner to create a new product. It is reported at www.bloomberg.com, with referring to Roger Ver’ Executive Director and statement of Ver himself in Malta, where he became the most anticipated speaker.  Roger Ver is well known to crypto-enthusiasts as an early bitcoin investor and the most ardent supporter of Bitcoin Cash, which currently ranks fourth in the CoinMarketCap rating in capitalization.  Ver plans to launch his own platform at bitcoin.com and make Bitcoin Cash the primary currency. Perhaps not all the crypto community is thrilled about such an active promotion of Bitcoin Cash, but Crypt-ON CEO Paul Andreev and the whole project team supports the initiative of creating another crypto-exchange. This is another decisive step towards de-monopolization of the cryptocurrency market. At the last September summit (Futurama Blockchain Innovators Summit) in Ibiza, Paul listened to Roger Ver speech about decentralized exchanges, and their role in the crypto-industry. The development of Crypt-ON as a project presupposes the creation of DAO in the future, so the topic raised by Roger Ver was significant for the project CEO. Subsequently, Paul and Roger personally talked about decentralization.  Just to remind you:  Crypt-ON is a multi-service p2p platform built on smart contracts and an individual rating system.  We are confident that at the stage of the pre-TGE completion, such news will be a powerful impetus for the development of the platform, as we go in the right direction, driven by a common goal — to be helpful to the global crypto community.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: P2P-exchanger is one of the main services of the Crypt-ON platform   The Crypt-ON platform combines several services. (Local crypto) P2P-exchange is one of them. The development of this service was prompted by a potential opportunity to make the process of cryptocurrency exchange faster and more cost-effective by creating the conditions for the exchange of funds within one platform. Our service will act as a tool for exchange, and a guarantor of compliance with the terms of the transaction. This process will look like this: first, the seller or buyer must place an advertisement on the site to sell or buy cryptocurrency. At the time of placing the ad, the system will check the sellers account for the necessary funds. When the parties find each other on such an ad, and the system will determine the location of both counterparties based on geolocation data in the mobile application, which will allow the parties to choose the closest counterparty with the best rating and verify their reality. Then parties discuss and approve the terms of the transaction, such as time and place, after which they fixed in the smart contract, and when this stage passed the system will “freeze” the specified amount of cryptocurrency on the seller’s account. Exactly one hour before the meeting, the mobile application will notify the parties about the place and time of the deal. If any of the parties did not going stop the transaction or change the place and time, after confirmation by the seller in the application of receiving money from the buyer, the cryptocurrency would be credited to the buyer’s account. Exchanged money can be transferred both in cash and by electronic transfer. In case of cancellation of the transaction — the reserved funds will be returned to the seller’s account, and if the parties want to postpone the meeting to another time or place, it can be done in a predetermined time. All actions of parties in the process of the transaction will be recorded in the blockchain and rating system will be formed on these data: the more responsible and decent the parties will act in the trade, the higher will be their rating and the more other users will want to deal with them.

Author: XcomFarm
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: And what do you mean by limited market issue?

Author: eleonora0x
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Unfortunately, not all goods or services and not in all countries can be purchased for the cryptocurrency. Many states and banking structures create all sorts of barriers on the way to integrate cryptocurrencies into the traditional economy. To solve this issue through direct interaction between market participants, it is necessary to overcome two main obstacles: the problem of trust and a high volatility level of digital assets

To date, the Airdrop from Crypt-ON was attended by 10243 people, 3087 of them have not completed all the tasks, but they still have time to fix the situation. Airdrop will continue as long as the first 10,500 people do not complete the challenge.  We appreciate your time and expect responsible participation in events and campaigns of our project.  Crypt-ON team

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: KYC procedure and its features   Lately, many of ICO participants going through the KYC process. What is it and what is it for? KYC (Know your Client, sometimes — Know your Customer) — is the policy followed by banks and financial institutions to verify the identity of their customers. It is mandatory for financial transactions. For the first time, the procedure introduced at the beginning of 2000-es and now this measure is used to identify the individual who conducts an online transaction to prevent the money laundering, terrorist financing, and fraud. Why is Crypt-ON platform required KYC? The verification procedure allows holding a tokensale as transparently as possible. We make it clear to partners and registered users that they are dealing with a platform for legal transactions only, and this why it is necessary to pass verification. All personal information protected by encryption, besides, the user has the right to choose the ID document for account verification. The platform receives reliable information and does not allow users to register multiple profiles at the same time. After verification, you confirm your intentions and agree to process your personal data. For the platform, it is a signal that you become a part of it and ready to use the services, participate in the development of the platform and increase your trust-rating. At the same time, the KYC procedure is not always needed. For example, if you participate in a Crypt-ON bounty campaign or airdrop, you do not need to pass the verification. You just need to follow the instructions governing participation in the relevant event to get IPT tokens to your wallet.  Are you not with us? KYC it’s easily! Join! ) Crypt-ON team

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: You will not be able to buy coffee at Starbucks for BTC   Numerous news that Starbucks has started cooperation with Microsoft and Intercontinental Exchange doesn't mean that visitors will be able to spend their bitcoins at the coffee retailer’s locations.  Starbucks has refuted the surmises of cryptocurrency holders about the possibility to pay for coffee with cryptocurrency. The essence of cooperation between the three companies is not in the introduction of bitcoin acceptance in coffee shops, but in the creation of service for the BTC exchange to fiat money, for example, US dollars, which visitors can spend for their lattes.  “It is important to clarify that we are not accepting digital assets at Starbucks. Rather the exchange will convert digital assets like Bitcoin into US dollars, which can be used at Starbucks,” a Starbucks spokesperson wrote.  “Customers will not be able to pay for Frappuccinos with bitcoin,” the company representative added.  For most of the progressive humankind, the need for the widespread introduction of services for the exchange of digital currency for fiat has become apparent. It remains only to guess which company will be able to become a reliable partner for each cryptocurrency holder.  The Crypt-ON team accepts this challenge, in turn, we are open to constructive dialogue and cooperation to create more comfortable conditions for all owners of digital assets.  One of the four services of our platform - p2p local exchange, which helps people from any of the continents, or any country of the world, to exchange fiat money for cryptocurrency and Vice versa. Using our application and the geolocation function, you can find the nearest partner able to participate in the exchange. All actions of the transaction parties are stored in the blockchain, as they affect the rating displayed through the trust token. It gradually forms the reputation of users involved in transactions and allows you to conclude the degree of reliability of potential counterparties in trades. Thus, users benefit from acting responsibly and decently in part of their obligations, thereby increasing the level of trust of other users.

Author: JackJackD
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Greetings everyone. Today we can see many spheres sharply growing up, because people are constantly getting more and more used to comfort and great projects. But is there any market analysis of the sphere Crypt-ON deals with?

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Well, today, the capabilities of modern smartphones already allow making complex financial decisions, and the new generation of applications makes services such as online shopping or money transfers faster, cheaper and more accurate than traditional services. The possibilities of this market are enormous. BI Intelligence estimates that globally the peer – to – peer transfer market is already valued at more than $ 1 trillion, and only a small part of these transactions-just $5 billion in the US, for example-are now conducted via mobile phones. The total volume of mobile P2P transactions in the US is expected to reach $86 billion in 2018

Author: JackJackD
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: And what are these advantages of P2P interactions? Why is that becoming more and more popular?

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Well, the main advantage of the P2P interaction model in transactions and loans is the elimination of an intermediary such as a bank, a notary, or a lawyer who complicates transactions between people with a lot of papers and questionnaires to be completed and the need to provide confirmations and guarantees. Interest rates, terms, requirements for documents, and procedures for filing are established solely by these intermediaries

Author: JackJackD
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: In this case I believe P2P will probably also help to solve some problems that may occur among users. Thank you, became more clear for me now

Body: Well, among the numerous well–known jurisdictions for running ICOs, Cyprus offers some significant benefits which should be taken into account. Evidence of this is the fact that a lot of companies choose to run their ICOs in Cyprus

Author: tonyhawk909
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: I am not an expert, though, as far as I know, Cyprus is an EU Member State and its tax regime -which is approved by the EU – is modern and quite attractive putting Cyprus in the whitelist of tax jurisdictions globally. Any organization running its ICO in Cyprus will be entitled to the considerable number of advantages on offer through incorporation in this jurisdiction but also, what is important is that ICOs are generally unregulated inside the EU something which should be viewed as an opportunity since for now the status quo favors freedom of enterprise

Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hey there friend and welcome   Crypt-ON  is a multiservice p2p platform to provide safe and secure transactions based on smart contracts. Besides the escrow service, the Crypt-ON ecosystem includes a p2p lending service, a crypto freelance marketplace and a p2p local crypto-exchange.  Using a variety of Crypt-ON services it will be easy to buy and sell goods, apply for loans, look for work or hire professionals and to exchange cryptocurrency for fiat. All operations of the platform users are stored in smart-contracts

Body: Crypt-ON news digest.  The last few months have been really important and hard working for the whole Crypt-ON team, so now we would like to share some important news and results with you.  - our team has launched a Bounty campaign and Airdrop;  - the first publications about our project were posted on several global cryptocurrency sites;  - team members led by our CEO Pavel Andreev visited some significant and large blockchain events: Blockchain Cruise Mediterranean, Futurama Blockchain Innovators Summit, Delta Summit Malta  - CEO Pavel Andreev during various events had met with some key figures of the crypto industry including Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao and “Bitcoin Jesus” Roger Ver and discussed with them a current situation in the crypto market, prospects for the development of the p2p transaction market and decentralized platforms  - we launched pre-TGE, since the start of which we have already raised $384,000  Stay in touch. It’s only the beginning;)  Crypt-ON team.

Author: rafenfre
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hello there. Can you please once again outline all 4 components? Of course, if you have time! Thanks in advance

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Greetings refenfre. I can help you out with that. There are the following 4 aspects:    Service to assist in secure trades through an independent arbitrator (escrow) It provides the ability to conduct any type of secure trade using cryptocurrency. The insurance of transactions will serve as additional protection of interests of all parties.    Service to assist in finding and obtaining loans (P2P lending) It provides the opportunity to borrow/lend in cryptocurrencies on mutually beneficial terms without the participation of an intermediary. The use of a rating system that determines the level of reliability of potential borrowers will reduce the number of defaults to a minimum.    Service to assist in finding employment/specialists (crypto-freelance job exchange) It provides independent professionals in the field of the crypto industry the possibility of finding remote work, and companies or projects—the possibility of hiring such specialists. The parties can directly agree on the execution of various types of work, using the cryptocurrency in their calculations.    Service to assist platform members in P2P cryptocurrency exchange without mediators. It provides users with the opportunity to exchange cryptocurrency for fiat money between themselves directly without the participation of an intermediary, using geotargeting to find contractors in their region.

People began to exchange values long ago, as soon as they had free raw materials and the results of their work — food, clothing, etc. At first, they changed foods, then goods, after they changed goods for money, and there was always a problem of transactions security. Nowadays, it is not necessary to have a personal attendance to conduct a trade, it can be done through intermediaries, using special services. Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Crypt-ON and Binance meeting in Malta!   CEO of Crypt-ON Paul Andreev held a business meeting with CEO and founder of the largest crypto exchange Binance Changpeng Zhao, who also is active in promoting and popularizing cryptocurrencies in Asia and North America. The meeting of the two CEO was held at the Delta Summit, setting in Malta from 3 to 5 October. In the talks they touched upon the current situation in the crypto-currency market, the development of the p2p transactions market and their implementation using blockchain technologies, as well as the prospects of decentralized organizations. Changpeng is convinced that the concept of DAO and decentralized platforms has a great future. Changpeng demonstrated confidence in the success of the digital asset market by example, when in 2013 sold his own property and invested all his savings in bitcoin. After the rate of the main cryptocurrency fell more than twice, Changpeng realized that the future hasn’t come yet. In his own words, he don’t know when it will come. Perhaps we are at first step to this phase, it maybe another year, two or five, but he convinced that the future in decentralization!

Author: ferdi252
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hey there community. I read about smart contracts Crypt-ON uses, this all sounds extremely good, however is it simple how smart-contract ensures the credibility of trades?

Author: XxX_ZORG_XxX
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hey Ferdi. Yes, seemingly you are right, but we must take into account some necessary conditions:  1) A decentralized execution environment required for the execution of the contract. The Crypt-ON platform is ideal for this. Convenient Personal Account, fast operations, support of different cryptocurrencies — what is not the whole list of advantages offered by the platform. Soon, on crypt-on.io all users optionally will be able to issue smart contracts using the platform and Metamask independently. 2) Also, automatic bases for quick transactions and specialized tools for the execution of contracts needed. 3) Be sure to keep in mind that smart-contracts implemented not in all cryptocurrencies. You can use Crypt-ON platform if you make the deals in the I-Point, Stablecoin, Bitcoin (BTC), Litecoin (LTC) or Ethereum (ETH). Moreover, in the calculation in the I-Point, the fee is reduced by half.

Author: ferdi252
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: They are not the first and won’t be the last to use blockchain technology for business, investment, job search capabilities. Many make attempts to unite different activities in a frame of one project. But, as a rule, their main goal is to create some alternatives for banks/lawyers who are intermediaries in financial transactions. Crypt-ON is developing an unique eco-system for cryptocommunity - a platform for direct interaction between people, which contains all the necessary tools for work and business with payments in cryptocurrency

Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hello everyone! I've read about you having a trust-token, haven't fully got the idea. Is it possible for you to explain it once again, please?

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: I can clarify that for you Trust-token (reputational token) is a service token to account for actions that affect the platform user's rating, and store them in encrypted form. It will contain transaction data, trades results, reviews, etc. All of these factors will influence the user's rating, determining the degree of trust from other participants. Have you heard about other technologies and instruments they are using?

Author: log63amg
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Thanks a lot! Yeah, but not deeply, just had a look at it at their website! I saw something like a stable coin in there, but what is that exactly?

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: By definition, a stablecoin is an asset – not a currency – which offers price stability characteristics  So, at Crypt-ON the use of stablecoin, not affected by high volatility of crypto assets, will serve as an additional protection to the interests of participants

Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐

Author: SaprikMazhik
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: If I am not mistaken, there are the following 4 points:  1) Service to assist in secure trades through an independent arbitrator (escrow) It provides the ability to conduct any type of secure trade using cryptocurrency. The insurance of transactions will serve as additional protection of interests of all parties.  2) Service to assist in finding and obtaining loans (P2P lending) It provides the opportunity to borrow/lend in cryptocurrencies on mutually beneficial terms without the participation of an intermediary. The use of a rating system that determines the level of reliability of potential borrowers will reduce the number of defaults to a minimum.  3) Service to assist in finding employment/specialists (crypto-freelance job exchange) It provides independent professionals in the field of the crypto industry the possibility of finding remote work, and companies or projects—the possibility of hiring such specialists. The parties can directly agree on the execution of various types of work, using the cryptocurrency in their calculations.  4) Service to assist platform members in P2P cryptocurrency exchange without mediators. It provides users with the opportunity to exchange cryptocurrency for fiat money between themselves directly without the participation of an intermediary, using geotargeting to find contractors in their region.

Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: This is where Basil is to help  There are the following types of smart contacts:  1. Smart-contracts for an individual transaction between the parties.  2. Smart-contracts for platform partners.  3. Smart-contracts for small transactions.  Crypt-ON open such a smart-contract opened once, and all users of the platform will be able to use it. The main advantage is that at the conclusion of such contracts users will not be charged a Commission for their release, which is especially beneficial for small transactions  The transfer of funds will be carried out to the smart-contract directly, payments through Metamask will be used for the simplicity of operations.  Thanks to smart contracts, you can directly, without intermediaries, enter into transactions, take loans, hire performers and exchange cryptocurrency for money.  You no longer need to rely on someone’s opinion or trust someone’s word. Take advantage of innovative technologies!

Author: anvelaflora
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Thanks a lot Basil! And what do u mean by smart contacts for platform partners? How are they different?

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: If I am not mistaken, it means that partners will be able to open such a smart contract once and carry out all transactions with customers in it, as in the Ledger. And under different areas of business, separate groups of products can open different smart contracts

Author: anvelaflora
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: I see the point. And Smart contracts for individual transaction is pretty the same or no? Probably you also know that

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Not exactly, Anvela. These will be used for essential transactions in large amounts. However, if you specify in the settings that the trade is “important”, a smart-contract will be automatically released to conduct an individual transaction regardless of the amount, so this is quite a convenient feature to implement

Author: anvelaflora
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐

Author: CyprusTokens
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hey everyone, I believe that everyone has heard of freelance marketplace they have. But I don't fully get how it works. Can someone provide more details on this, please?

Author: anvelaflora
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hey friend. If I am not mistaken, this was already asked by someone in here. But the process works the following way:  1. The customer places a request with a description of the task. For the convenience of customers and performers, a searching system provides a selection by rating and allows you to find a highly qualified performer quickly or to have an idea of the customer’s reliability. 2. At the same time, the customer’s account must have enough i-Point tokens to pay for the contractor’s services; otherwise, he will not be able to publish the task. 3. Performers submit applications. 4. Customers consider candidates and confirm their choice. The contractor and the customer specify in advance the terms of a deal recorded in the smart-contract. 5. The task goes to work. After its execution, the contractor sends the results of the work for verification. 6. Payment for the finished service/work is carried out in i-Point tokens. 7. If the work had been violated the conditions fixed in the smart contract, an arbitrator includes in the dispute resolution. The arbitrator acts as a third party in the multi-signature of the smart-contract. 8. All actions of the parties are stored in the smart-contract and affect the reputation of both the customer and the contractor, changing their rating.  As for me, quite simple and understandable

Author: Grandmasterbit93
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hey hey! Can someone tell me more about escrow at Crypt-ON?

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hey! What exactly can I help you with? Are you interested what Escrow is in general? If so, escrow is a special type of transaction between a depositor, i.e. the account holder and the beneficiary — those to whom the funds are intended, and there also is a third independent party — an escrow agent. An escrow agent can be a bank, law firm, or specialized company. Usually, when carrying out such operations, the Bank opens an account which is fixed and blocked a certain amount of money, documents or other values that will be available only after certain conditions that are agreed in advance

Author: Grandmasterbit93
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Yeah, that was I was interested in, but at first! Is the technology popular now?

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Yeah, it is really popular throughout ICO project, it is commonly used worldwide in top projects. More to this, In the US and EU countries, such transactions are common when buying real estate, they are common in the East — in China and even in Mongolia. For example, there are three parties to an escrow transaction: the seller, the buyer and the escrow agent. The latter will monitor the implementation of the terms of the transaction, and in our example — the signing of documents. When the seller signs all the documents, the agent will unlock the funds on the escrow account and issue them

Author: Grandmasterbit93
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Noted, thank you, this makes sense! I think escrow is quite promising and may be even more popular in future in different spheres. And how it works in blockchain?

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Speaking about the escrow in the blockchain, you need to understand that the issue of security during online transactions is updated as the moment of funds transfer approaches. Just as in everyday life, there is a demand for a third party, which will monitor the process of fulfilling the terms of the transaction and act as an arbitrator, in case of disputes. And speaking about Crypt-ON, in accordance with this, a special software module was created on the Crypt-ON platform, through which transactions arbitration and dispute resolution will be carried out

Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Evening community! I know that you have geotargeting cryptocurrency-to-fiat exchange. But how exactly does it work?

Author: XxX_ZORG_XxX
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Geotargeting p2p exchange works like this. The seller or the buyer places an announcement in the system to sell or buy a some amount of the cryptocurrency. You can select yout transaction partner by using geolocation in the mobile app. System also checks the buyer's account for the necessary funds for the transaction. Then the parties discuss the terms of the deal, date and time and makes an appointment. Cryptocurrency rate is automatically calculated by the system. If the parties meet, the seller must confirm the cash / money transfer from the buyer in the mobile application, after which the system transfers the reserved cryptocurrency to the buyer's account

Author: ivanovmoscow
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: The most important question that for some reason no one raises at this stage but it will definitely appear later and will it be relevant with taxes? I, as a libertarian, do not like taxes, but if you want the project to not have problems then when the regulators come to ask questions, you should prepare for it in advance. Otherwise, even if there is an excellent start, you may find yourself having to close the project. In addition, large fund investors prefer options where everything is a bit more transparent from this point of view.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Escrow service in Crypt-ON platform    Escrow is a special type of transaction between a depositor, i.e. the account holder and the beneficiary — those to whom the funds are intended, and there also is a third independent party — an escrow agent. An escrow agent can be a bank, law firm, or specialized company. Usually, when carrying out such operations, the Bank opens an account which is fixed and blocked a certain amount of money, documents or other values that will be available only after certain conditions that are agreed in advance.  Thus, the parties make their actions as safe and honest as possible. In case of disputes-their solution will not be difficult, as there is a third party that does not represent the interests of the beneficiary or the depositor.  Analyzing the need and prospects for the introduction of escrow technology into the market, we rely on the long-term practice of such operations around the world. In the US and EU countries, such transactions are common when buying real estate, they are common in the East — in China and even in Mongolia. For example, there are three parties to an escrow transaction: the seller, the buyer and the escrow agent. The latter will monitor the implementation of the terms of the transaction, and in our example — the signing of documents. When the seller signs all the documents, the agent will unlock the funds on the escrow account and issue them.  Speaking about the escrow in the blockchain, you need to understand that the issue of security during online transactions is updated as the moment of funds transfer approaches. Just as in everyday life, there is a demand for a third party, which will monitor the process of fulfilling the terms of the transaction and act as an arbitrator, in case of disputes. In accordance with this, a special software module was created on the Crypt-ON platform, through which transactions arbitration and dispute resolution will be carried out.  At the first stage, this will be done exclusively by the project team members, but over time we will transfer these functions to those users who wish to participate in the system. The selection of a candidate for delegation of authority will be based on verification and rating system. Users with the highest rating will be admitted to the insurance of transactions, but in addition we provide a system of accreditation to identify their relevant skills/competencies required to perform the functions of an arbitrator.  In the final stage of the platform development, users will choose delegates on the basis of voting, to whom they are ready to entrust the insurance of transactions and dispute resolution.  Summing up, the following should be noted: blockchain is now becoming a system, and the prospects for the development of this FinTech-field will depend on what we lay in its Foundation. Our team believes that through such transformations the blockchain community will achieve success and universal recognition.

Author: basil-usa
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hey Zorg! Pretty easy to use   1. The customer places a request with a description of the task. For the convenience of customers and performers, a searching system provides a selection by rating and allows you to find a highly qualified performer quickly or to have an idea of the customer’s reliability. 2. At the same time, the customer’s account must have enough i-Point tokens to pay for the contractor’s services; otherwise, he will not be able to publish the task. 3. Performers submit applications. 4. Customers consider candidates and confirm their choice. The contractor and the customer specify in advance the terms of a deal recorded in the smart-contract. 5. The task goes to work. After its execution, the contractor sends the results of the work for verification. 6. Payment for the finished service/work is carried out in i-Point tokens. 7. If the work had been violated the conditions fixed in the smart contract, an arbitrator includes in the dispute resolution. The arbitrator acts as a third party in the multi-signature of the smart-contract. 8. All actions of the parties are stored in the smart-contract and affect the reputation of both the customer and the contractor, changing their rating

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Secure trades based on smart-contracts: mission possible    Imagine that you live in New York and want to sell your apartment without intermediaries, but the potential buyer is in Spain. Is it possible to conduct such the deal, with the protection of your interests and preventing possible risks? Five years ago, such transaction seemed almost impossible, but not today. The advent of distributed ledger technology in 2008 catalyzed web development. The Ethereum blockchain launched in July 2015, gave the world smart-contracts that allow exchanging assets without any intermediaries. Smart-contract is a computer protocol that ensures the conclusion and performance of commercial contracts on blockchain technology. With its help, it became possible to conduct transactions remotely without worrying about the reliability of counterparties. Many prominent analysts predict that smart-contracts in the future can leave lawyers, bank clerks, and realtors without the work, because thanks to smart-contracts, the intermediaries would then be unnecessary. Besides, it became possible to enter into economic relations with any contractors, regardless place of residence.  How can a smart-contract ensure the credibility of trades? The program code of the smart-contract contains all information about the transaction, which allows full automation and reliability of the execution of contractual obligations. Thus, the participation of the parties at the stage of performance is not required. After fulfilling the commitments set out in the smart-contract, the buyer receives an apartment in New York, and you as a seller - a predetermined amount of the trade.  Is it so simple? Yes, seemingly, but we must take into account some necessary conditions: A decentralized execution environment required for the execution of the contract. The Crypt-ON platform is ideal for this. Convenient Personal Account, fast operations, support of different cryptocurrencies - what is not the whole list of advantages offered by the platform. Soon, on crypt-on.io all users optionally will be able to issue smart contracts using the platform and Metamask independently. Also, automatic bases for quick transactions and specialized tools for the execution of contracts needed. Be sure to keep in mind that smart-contracts implemented not in all cryptocurrencies. You can use Crypt-ON platform if you make the deals in the I-Point, Stablecoin, Bitcoin (BTC), Litecoin (LTC) or Ethereum (ETH). Moreover, in the calculation in the I-Point, the fee is reduced by half.   With the Crypt-ON platform, the mission of transactions safety is possible!  You can work and build a business in different ways. We offer convenient and safest one. Crypt-ON

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: New players at the Crypt-ON team   The Crypt-ON team gets the reinforcement!  Many crypto-enthusiasts trust us and understand the importance of the opportunities that the platform opens for independent entrepreneurs, crypto-freelancers, and investors. In early September of this year officially signed a cooperation agreement between Crypt-ON and Roman Cantarero. Roman is a Technical Business Manager in Risk, Technology and Operations at Santader Bank, UK, which is why he took over the development of p2p lending and escrow services.  For several years after completion of the Blockchain Strategy programme at the Oxford University, Roman has been working in this direction, and will now use this knowledge to promote the Crypt-ON platform.  And recently blockchain expert Deepanshu Bhatt, who had taken part in many ambitious projects that available at https://icobench.com/u/deepanshu-bhatt, got interested in our project. More than two years of experience in marketing and blockchain and his business sense for the successful projects prompted him to act. So now Deepanshu Bhatt is part of the Crypt-ON team, and he explores, advises and inspiringly talks about the possibilities, perspectives, and his vision for the future of the project with great prospects. He will also speak at the ucim.io blockchain conference in Singapore. If you plan to attend this event, you will have the opportunity to personally ask any questions about Crypt-ON to our new advisor.  We always welcome initiative, thoughtful specialists, professionals who understand that the value of business platforms is not only in their functionality but also in the atmosphere in which these opportunities created, in the team working on the implementation of the plan.  If you want to be useful then join Crypt-ON, we appreciate experienced professionals!

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: In Copperfield’s footsteps or as Roger Ver spoke at two blockchain-events at once   If you catch to perform at two great blockchain meetings in a few days, then you are Roger Ver. What else can you do? How could the BitcoinCash proponent miss the most exciting events of this year, by chance, scheduled for the almost same date? We’re talking about Blockchain Mediterranean Cruise organized by CoinsBank from 7 to 11 September and Futurama Blockchain Innovators Summit, which takes place in Ibiza from 10 to 13 September. The Crypt-ON founders Paul Andreev and Alexander Vat were lucky enough to listen to Roger Ver and attend two events at once but on their own.  Bitcoin Evangelist, Bitcoin Cash supporter, CEO of Bitcoin.Com Roger Ver, along with Charlie Lee, John McAfee, and Brock Pierce, was one of the most anticipated Blockchain Cruise speakers. During his speech on September 10, Ver, as usual, began with a personal history of meet with bitcoin, told how he first learned about the cryptocurrency and wanted to read again a sci-fi books, which he has been keen on in childhood, as he understood that the events described in it occur in reality. Roger Ver also remembered how he bought the first bitcoin in 2011. As then, and now he believes that it is the cryptocurrency that gives economic freedom, reduces corruption. As an example, he cited countries that demonstrate rapid progress in the economy thanks to the comprehensive support of the cryptocurrency market: Singapore, Hong Kong, Switzerland, New Zealand. Roger accompanied his report with vivid photographs of Hong Kong’s urban planning, comparing it to Havana, where nothing has changed due to the lack of economic freedom. At the end of his speech, he examined the technical capabilities of Bitcoin and Bitcoin Cash. He said a few words about decentralization and its vast potential that was particularly inspired by Alexander Vat and Pavel Almazov, Crypt-ON sales consultant. At the summit, Roger Ver spoke about decentralized exchanges and their role in the crypto-industry. This topic was of particular interest to Pavel Andreev, the Crypt-ON founder, who attended the summit to get the latest news of the cryptocurrency world first-hand and present the project of a multi-service p2p platform built on smart contracts and an individual rating system to a crypto-community. That’s how both the Crypt-ON team’s leaders with an interval of a few days, were able to see and hear the famous blockchain Evangelist and get a powerful boost of energy before the start of TGE.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: The medallion from Brock Pierce will be the mascot of the Crypt-ON project.   Brock Pierce is a man of legend, he is called the mascot of the blockchain and the entire cryptocurrency industry. How else can we explain the fact that any significant project in which he participates is bound to success? The legendary crypto investor has a unique flair, an innate vision of the prospects of various startups and he invests only in successful ICO.  Chairman of the Bitcoin Foundation, co-founder of Blockchain Capital, EOS, Tether, and Mastercoin Brock Pierce regularly supports various teams of crypto-enthusiasts, if he is 100% confident in the prospects of the project. Before the Futurama Blockchain Innovators Summit in Ibiza, it became known that Pierce plans to invest $1 billion in projects in the field of charity.  During a Blockchain Cruise Mediterranean, Crypt-ON co-founder Aleksandr Vat managed to meet and talk with Brock Pierce, a “venture capitalist, and philanthropist” as it was announced by the organizers. Brock and Aleksandr were on the same wavelength. Both crypto-enthusiasts have lived on the Islands for several years, Aleksandr on Tenerife, and Brock on Ibiza. That is why they talked a lot about Spain, and the billionaire investor presented a medallion to the young project for “good luck.” I’d like to believe, that the gift received from the hands of a man who has become a symbol of luck in the crypto world, will be the mascot of the project Crypt-ON and will bring it a success.  Photo: Brock Pierce and Aleksandr Vat during a CoinsBank Blockchain Cruise Mediterranean

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hello, our project is different from the rest by the following: 1. We using the reputation token (Trust-token), displaying the trust rating/reputation of each participant will solve the issue of trust and improve the quality/safety of online transactions. 2. An independent intermediary system (in WhitePaper, called "Escrow") will ensure the security of transactions through the use of automatically generated smart-contracts. 3. The low platform fees and the combination of various services within a single platform will contribute to the growth of the P2P transactions 4. Volatility risks are reduced by using the stablecoin in the system of transactions made using the platform services.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Blockchain outside corruption: the signing of an agreement between a CoinBene and John McAfee   In the world of blockchain and cryptocurrencies, we know experts whose opinion is listened to by many thousands audience. One of them is John McAfee, a famous British programmer, businessman, founder of McAfee anti-virus software company. Although in 2011 the company was renamed Intel Security, after the purchase by Intel, the software still retains the McAfee brand. Well, John secured a reputation as a person who can analyze the world situation and make the right conclusions.  John McAfee is confident that the adoption of Bitcoin by governments around the world will help in the fight against corruption. He had spoken about it even before the Blockchain Mediterranean Cruise and confirmed its intentions with concrete actions, founding the McAfee Alliance. During the cruise, John McAfee officially announced the signing of a partnership agreement between the Singapore exchange CoinBene and the Alliance led by him. The primary purpose of this accord — the fight against corruption and money laundering on some exchanges. Such as on HitBTC, which the McAfee Alliance often spoke out against on Twitter and will continue to do this, as it appears, with drawing new supporters.  CoinBene has already made a loud statement, offering cryptocurrencies placed on HitBTC to leave the exchange under the terms of free listing on CoinBene. By the way, John McAfee and his Alliance, according to the agreement, will bear this costs.  The fact that the agreement was signed at such a global event as Blockchain Cruise Mediterranean indicates that both parties intend to continue to “exert pressure” on HitBTC, so other exchanges need to think twice before use corruption schemes.  These are the first steps to mass “artificial selection” in the world of cryptocurrencies, indicating that the main thing that large platforms should strive for is decentralization. That is why the creation of DAO is an essential stage in the development of the Crypt-ON platform and the evolution of the user community. Joint distributed management of the platform — that’s what awaits the project and everyone who plans to take part in it, in future.  Pre-TGE starts 01.10.2018!  Stay in touch.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Crypto-Freelance marketplace in Crypt-ON   One of the services of the Crypt-ON platform is the Crypto Freelance marketplace. It is a job exchange that allows independent specialists from all over the world to interact with customers and get rewards in cryptocurrency. A simple and user-friendly interface will let you to quickly agree on the terms and conditions and the terms of payment. The interests of both parties protected by a smart-contract, which will record all the requirements. In case of disputes, independent arbitrators will be included in the work.  How would it work?  1. The customer places a request with a description of the task. For the convenience of customers and performers, a searching system provides a selection by rating and allows you to find a highly qualified performer quickly or to have an idea of the customer’s reliability. At the same time, the customer’s account must have enough i-Point tokens to pay for the contractor’s services; otherwise, he will not be able to publish the task.  3. Performers submit applications.  4. Customers consider candidates and confirm their choice. The contractor and the customer specify in advance the terms of a deal recorded in the smart-contract.  5. The task goes to work. After its execution, the contractor sends the results of the work for verification.  6. Payment for the finished service/work is carried out in i-Point tokens.  7. If the work had been violated the conditions fixed in the smart contract, an arbitrator includes in the dispute resolution. The arbitrator acts as a third party in the multi-signature of the smart-contract.  8. All actions of the parties are stored in the smart-contract and affect the reputation of both the customer and the contractor, changing their rating.  What benefits do the parties receive?  Customers will be able to find specialists and experts to meet the challenges they face and pay for the work in cryptocurrency. Fixing the terms of cooperation in smart contracts will guarantee their invariability. The use of the rating system will allow for an objective selection of contractors based on the assessment of users ‘ actions and their feedback about each other.  Since the Crypt-ON platform is multifunctional, freelancers will be able to exchange cryptocurrency for fiat and withdraw earned money quickly. It is convenient from the point of view of reducing withdrawal fees, especially if it is necessary to make multiple operations.  Are there any downsides? Of course, as in all cases, it cannot be avoided. For example, it can take time to find a remote employee, which is undesirable for quick-start projects. An employer may delay a payment process because you can always find flaws in the completed work if you search for it. However, if the performer is done his job in accordance with the terms of the specification stored in the smart contract, then the arbitrator will protect the interests of the contractor.  Notwithstanding, the Crypto Freelance marketplace of the Crypt-ON platform is an excellent alternative for crypto — freelancers, headhunters and HR professionals who are in search of performers.
