Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Advantages of the Crypt-On platform   The list of businesses integrated into the blockchain is proliferating. The number of projects building their activities using innovative technologies that broke into our lives a few years ago is continually increasing. The marketplaces, job exchanges, services, credits and many others. How not to get lost among such a wealth of proposals, especially if you need to solve different problems?  The Crypt-ON platform is a comprehensive solution to many problems faced by the participants of the crypto industry today, as it combines four services at once: Escrow trades, crypto-freelance exchange, p2p lending and p2p local exchange.  Its main advantages include the following:  1. Implementation of a reputation token (trust token), which displays the rating/reputation of each user of the platform will solve the problem of trust between the parties and improve the reliability of p2p operations.  2. The use of automatically generated smart contracts and the participation of an independent arbitrator will ensure the security of transactions.  3. Four services combined on the platform will allow you to solve various tasks in one place, multiplying your efficiency synergetically.  4. The ability to use stablecoin in calculations will reduce the risks associated with high volatility of most cryptocurrencies.  Thanks to the Crypt-ON platform, you will save time, be able to invest, earn and conduct secure p2p operations in cryptocurrency. So Crypt-ON will protect your interests and provide comfortable work with digital assets.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Why Charlie Lee sold all his assets in LTC.   Charlie Lee, the Litecoin founder and the seventh largest cryptocurrency owner (by capitalization), sold all his LTC assets in December 2017, when the coin price reached record values. What for? “Litecoin must be truly decentralized,” the computer scientist admitted on his blog before made a decision. He did this to avoid sole influence the rate of this cryptocurrency alone. “For a currency to really be … a worldwide decentralized currency, you can’t have … a real leader who’s trying to control things, so to make it more decentralized, eventually I would step away.” said Charlie Lee. By the way, in early July 2018, Lee supported a new bitcoin mining protocol that strengthens the decentralization of the bitcoin network.  Lee’s position is very close to the Crypt-ON project team. That’s why the roadmap provides for developing mechanisms for decentralized management of the platform, voting and the first elections of delegates. Mobile applications will be devised to support the functionality of the DAO voting system and mechanisms. This allows the project to grow and improve under the plan. Over time, the number of users who will appreciate the convenience of the platform services, simplicity and security of operations will increase. And, most importantly, users as co-owners of the platform, will independently influence its further development.  Crypt-ON. We are for decentralization!

Author: erkaufman
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Well, I got interested and read your Whitepaper...  And now your project looks like a SCAM to me. Or maybe you are not completely competent in the proj you're trying to create.  Let's take for example your P2P-LENDING SERVICE. There is description how it works in the WP. So, if someone borrows money and then he decides not to repay the procedure will be as following 1. The person will be suggested to borrow again. So he will literally prolong the debt. 2. Then he will be suggested to borrow from someone else and thus to repay his debt. I guess it's very serious method to solve the problem 3. What will be the next step if the 1st and 2nd stages do no good? "If the first two stages have not led to the settlement of the issue, its solution shall be transferred by the system to special external organizations with the consent of the Lender."(c) WTF?! Are you serious? It's definitely an "Epic fail". What does "External organizations" mean? Is it mafia, FBI, NSA, Interpol?   And what will you tell them? By the way, what jurisdiction are you yourself under? I haven't found the info. .  And who needs such a "reliable" service? There is no mentioning of loan insurance, risks insurance or of existing of your own system of compensation for losses.  I guess that the WP is aimed at noobs. And everything is written and looks like no one is going to do this seriously.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Crypt-ON smart-contracts  When making online transactions, their participants are not familiarized personally, and there are no usual intermediaries in the face of state, financial and legal institutions. That’s why the question of reliability of partners and verification of their business reputation remains thorny and pressing.  Blockchain technology, among other things, gave the world smart-contracts. Thanks to that it became possible to carry out secure trades with anonymity and without the participation of external intermediaries. The value of such transactions is in their openness and availability, as well as the fact that it is easy to track their history, but it is impossible to cancel their execution.  The use of innovative tools, such as smart contracts, can translate into reality ideas that seemed utopian a few years ago and effectively solve problems that traditional systems do not cope well.  The architecture of the Crypt-on platform is based on smart-contracts issued in the Ethereum blockchain. The reception and the refund will be made at the coincidence of two of the three signatures in the smart-contract. Crypt-on is a third party and connects only in cases of need to resolve the dispute between the parties in the person of the arbitrator.  When using such a contract, the parties do not need to trust each other. They merely describe the conditions of its execution, certifying them with a signature and ”freeze” the agreed amount on the blockchain. A significant term is that more than half of the signatures of the contract participants are required for the transfer of funds.  Users of the Crypt-ON platform will have access to the following types of smart contracts:  1. Smart-contracts for an individual transaction between the parties.  Will be used for essential transactions in large amounts. However, if you specify in the settings that the trade is “important”, a smart-contract will be automatically released to conduct an individual transaction regardless of the amount.  2. Smart-contracts for platform partners.  Partners will be able to open such a smart contract once and carry out all transactions with customers in it, as in the Ledger. Under different areas of business, separate groups of products can open different smart contracts.  3. Smart-contracts for small transactions.  Crypt-ON open such a smart-contract opened once, and all users of the platform will be able to use it. The main advantage is that at the conclusion of such contracts users will not be charged a Commission for their release, which is especially beneficial for small transactions.  The transfer of funds will be carried out to the smart-contract directly, payments through Metamask will be used for the simplicity of operations.  Thanks to smart contracts, you can directly, without intermediaries, enter into transactions, take loans, hire performers and exchange cryptocurrency for money.  You no longer need to rely on someone’s opinion or trust someone’s word. Take advantage of innovative technologies.  Crypt-ON

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Crypt-ON: who are we?   Despite the growing awareness of people about cryptocurrencies, the level of their practical application is still not very high.  The reasons are some problems and risks inherent in digital assets (poorly developed legal regulation, high volatility) and the lack of solutions that combine different activities in the crypto industry.    We, the team of the Crypt-ON project bringing together professionals from different countries, see the solution to these problems in the creation of the p2p platform, offering users a variety of services that use cryptocurrency for payments.  Platform Crypt-ON includes 4 of the service - Escrow trades, p2p lending, crypto freelance job exchange and p2p geo-exchange (exchange of cryptocurrencies for fiat with a search by geolocation).    In p2p systems, people interact directly, on the basis of the consent of all parties. Crypt-ON implements this model of interaction by smart-contracts, containing the terms of transactions. Thanks to smart-contracts, you can straight, without intermediaries, enter into transactions, take loans, hire performers and exchange cryptocurrency for fiat.  Also, we plan to create a single rating of borrowers, sellers and performers – honest, transparent and objective. To do this, the mechanics of the platform will use a trust-token - a particular token that contains records of all operations of the platform user and displayed in the form of a rating.  In case of disputes arising during the execution of transactions, a system of arbitration is provided for the resolution of contradictions. Its mechanism will evolve and improve as the project develops, striving for maximum decentralization.  The mission of Crypt-ON is to unite people from all over the world involved in the crypto industry, allowing them to interact with partners quickly, safely and comfortably in a variety of areas at all stages of cooperation.

Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Purchase of Crypt-ON tokens   To participate in the Crypt-ON project and purchase I-Point tokens, you need: 1. Register on the our Website to gain access to the personal account for the calculation and accounting of the i-Point tokens. Main stages: In the registration form, specify a valid e-mail, enter the password, then repeat the password. Read and agree to the terms of Privacy Policy and the website Terms and Conditions. Complete the registration (go to the e-mail, open the link in the letter, confirm e-mail). 2. Complete identity verification in the order provided during registration. Attention! I-Point tokens in exchange for cryptocurrency will be credited to the address in the Ethereum network. Don’t forget to create an ETH wallet and check availability. You can create a wallet on this website: https://www.myetherwallet.com/ Following all the steps is important. Check the box to agree with the rules of the token sale on the crypt-on.io. Next, you will have access to wallet addresses to transfer cryptocurrency for purchased I-Point tokens. You must specify the required amount of tokens and the type of cryptocurrency to exchange. Next, you get information about the amount of cryptocurrency and the wallet address for transfer. After the transfer to the specified wallet, you will be credited with I-Point tokens. All information about your transactions appears immediately. In your Personal Account or through the Etherscan service, you can check the fact of charging I-Point tokens to your address in the Ethereum network.

Author: nistra
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Geotargeting cryptocurrency-to-fiat exchange. How does it work? And how many the max token supplies on this project?

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Thank you for your interest! Geotargeting p2p exchange works like this. The seller or the buyer places an announcement in the system to sell or buy a some amount of the cryptocurrency. You can select yout transaction partner by using geolocation in the mobile app. System also checks the buyer's account for the necessary funds for the transaction. Then the parties discuss the terms of the deal, date and time and makes an appointment. Cryptocurrency rate is automatically calculated by the system. If the parties meet, the seller must confirm the cash / money transfer from the buyer in the mobile application, after which the system transfers the reserved cryptocurrency to the buyer's account.  180 mln IPT tokens will be released. 20 mln IPT tokens will be distributed among the members of the Crypt-ON project team with a NO sell restriction on the distributed tokens, for six months. 160 mln tokens will be sold during the TGE.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: Hi! The Trust- token (reputation token) helps to rank the reputation of the system members. It contains records of all platform user operations in the form of a trust rating. If the user has fulfilled the terms of the transaction, his rating upgrades, if not - it downgrades. So you can choose a most reliable partner for your deal.

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: What is the Crypt-ON advantages? 1. Using of the reputation token (Trust-token), displaying the trust rating of each participant, will solve the issue of trust and improve the quality of online transactions. 2. An independent intermediary system (“Escrow”) will ensure the security of transactions through the use of automatically generated smart contracts. No offchain and trust ”on the word" – the code is the law. 3. Volatility risks reduced by using the stablecoin in transaction system. 4. Commission of the platform is going to be partly reinvested in the project, partly used to support the stability of the I-Point.  Development of the Crypt-ON project will take 3 stages. First, it will be platform with centralized management, and it will be debugged and optimized. The next step is partially decentralized management. And in the end — the evolution of the project into a decentralized self-governing society (DAO), controlled by the project participants. This is the last and main stage of the project.  RoadMap:  December 2017 to June 2018 MPV development  June 2018 to July 2018 Private Sale  August 2018 Pre-TGE  September 2018 to December 2018 TGE  January 2019 to February 2019 Secure trades assistance; P2P loan search services development and launching  March 2019 to May 2019 Local P2P exchanges and crypto freelance job search services development and launch  June 2019 to July 2019 Decentralized platform management development  August 2019 to September 2019 Voting mechanism and people's arbitration launch, arbitrator's primary election  September 2019 to April 2020 Mobile app supporting system functionality and DAO voting mechanisms' development  October 2019 to January 2020 Project full evolution into the digital decentralized autonomous organization and token-fork  February 2020 to May 2020 Digital decentralized autonomous organization mechanism evolving, election system and development, DAO election  June 2020 to 2021 Project support and promotion

Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐

Author: CryptON_ICO
Title: [ANN][Pre-TGE]🌐👥🌌Crypt-ON - Multipurpose blockchain platform🌌👥🌐
Body: In attracting investors, we focus on two audiences: 1. Large investors and crypto funds. 2. Crypto-enthusiasts and cryptoanarchists. Many users are interested in the development of the project and are waiting for the opening of the service to work as crypto-freelancers, exchange the crypto currency, lend it or borrow. For many of them, it is important that the project will be presented to the world, will become a full DAO. Institutional investors can be assured in profit, which will be justified by the fact that the token will grow along with another cryptocurrency, and the market in whole. It ia possible due to the special fund for tokens buyback to prevent the token from falling in price. We will do this because we will become DAO. It will not be a commercial project, the main purpose of which is to maximize profits, it will be aimed at increasing the cost of the token and the number of users. The platform will be owned by all crypto community, which will keep tokens on their accounts.
